Japanese: コンクリート (タッチ) - 破壊
Chinese (traditional): 水泥方塊（觸碰）- 損壞

Japanese: コンクリート (タッチ) - 破壊
Chinese (traditional): 水泥方塊（觸碰）- 損壞

English: An industrial ingot of Iron, the primary building material of all human technology and engineering.
Deutsch: Ein industrieller Barren aus Eisen, dem Hauptbaustoff aller menschlichen Technologie und Technik.
Français: Un lingot industriel de fer, le principal matériau de construction de toute technologie et ingénierie humaines.
Italiano: Un lingotto industriale di ferro, il materiale da costruzione principale di tutta la tecnologia e l'ingegneria umana.
Spanish: Un lingote industrial de hierro, el principal material de construcción de toda la tecnología e ingeniería humanas.

English: An ingot of pure Cobalt. Commonly used in high-strength alloys and some electronics.
Deutsch: Ein industrieller Block aus Kobalt. Wird häufig in hochfesten Legierungen und einigen elektronischen Geräten verwendet.
Français: Un lingot industriel de cobalt. Couramment utilisé dans les alliages à haute résistance et certains composants électroniques.
Italiano: Un lingotto industriale di cobalto. Comunemente utilizzato nelle leghe ad alta resistenza e in alcuni componenti elettronici.
Spanish: Lingote industrial de cobalto. Se utiliza comúnmente en aleaciones de alta resistencia y algunos componentes electrónicos.

English: A common material used in everything from insulation to glass.
Deutsch: Ein gängiges Material, das von der Isolierung bis zum Glas verwendet wird.
Français: Un matériau commun utilisé dans tout, de l'isolation au verre.
Italiano: Un materiale comune utilizzato in tutto, dall'isolamento al vetro.
Spanish: Un material común utilizado en todo, desde aislamiento hasta vidrio.

English: Often used in high-strength electromagnets and Neodymium-doped glass lenses used in laser transmitters and weapons.
Deutsch: Wird häufig in hochfesten Elektromagneten und Neodym-dotierten Glaslinsen verwendet, die in Lasersendern und Waffen verwendet werden.
Français: Souvent utilisé dans les électroaimants à haute résistance et les lentilles en verre dopé au néodyme utilisés dans les émetteurs laser et les armes.
Italiano: Spesso utilizzato in elettromagneti ad alta resistenza e lenti in vetro drogato al neodimio utilizzate in trasmettitori laser e armi.
Spanish: A menudo se utiliza en electroimanes de alta resistencia y lentes de vidrio dopado con neodimio que se utilizan en transmisores láser y armas.

English: A thermally and electrically conductive metal used in almost every kind of electronic component.
Deutsch: Ein thermisch und elektrisch leitendes Metall, das in fast allen Arten von elektronischen Bauteilen verwendet wird.
Français: Un métal thermiquement et électriquement conducteur utilisé dans presque tous les types de composants électroniques.
Italiano: Un metallo termicamente ed elettricamente conduttivo utilizzato in quasi tutti i tipi di componenti elettronici.
Spanish: Un metal conductor térmico y eléctrico utilizado en casi todos los tipos de componentes electrónicos.

English: Compressed discs of promethium crystal that are used in power cells using thermal and piezoelectric catalysts to generate a stable fission reaction.
Deutsch: Komprimierte Scheiben aus Promethiumkristall, die in Kraftzellen unter Verwendung von thermischen und piezoelektrischen Katalysatoren verwendet werden, um eine stabile Spaltreaktion zu erzeugen.
Français: Disques compressés de cristal de prométhium utilisés dans les cellules de puissance utilisant des catalyseurs thermiques et piézoélectriques pour générer une réaction de fission stable.
Italiano: Dischi compressi di cristallo di promezio che vengono utilizzati nelle celle di potenza che utilizzano catalizzatori termici e piezoelettrici per generare una reazione di fissione stabile.
Spanish: Discos comprimidos de cristal de prometio que se utilizan en celdas de potencia mediante catalizadores térmicos y piezoeléctricos para generar una reacción de fisión estable.

English: A green-lustred metal similar in some aspects to both Beryllium and Gold. Its extremely low melting point and magnetic properties makes it ideal for plasma-based applications.
Deutsch: Ein grünes Metall, das in einigen Aspekten sowohl Beryllium als auch Gold ähnelt. Aufgrund seines extrem niedrigen Schmelzpunkts und seiner magnetischen Eigenschaften ist es ideal für Anwendungen auf Plasmabasis.
Français: Un métal lustré vert semblable à certains égards au béryllium et à l'or. Son point de fusion extrêmement bas et ses propriétés magnétiques le rendent idéal pour les applications à base de plasma.
Italiano: Un metallo lustrato verde simile per alcuni aspetti sia al berillio che all'oro. Il suo punto di fusione estremamente basso e le proprietà magnetiche lo rendono ideale per applicazioni basate sul plasma.
Spanish: Un metal de color verde brillante similar en algunos aspectos al berilio y al oro. Su punto de fusión extremadamente bajo y sus propiedades magnéticas lo hacen ideal para aplicaciones basadas en plasma.

English: A unique metal that oxides a bright red. Zascosium has high spectral reflectivity when polished and exceptional hardness but is brittle.
Deutsch: Ein einzigartiges Metall, das ein leuchtendes Rot oxidiert. Zascosium hat ein hohes spektrales Reflexionsvermögen beim Polieren und eine außergewöhnliche Härte, ist jedoch spröde.
Français: Un métal unique qui oxyde un rouge vif. Le zascosium a une réflectivité spectrale élevée lorsqu'il est poli et une dureté exceptionnelle mais il est cassant.
Italiano: Un metallo unico che ossida un rosso brillante. Lo zascosio ha un'elevata riflettività spettrale quando è lucidato e una durezza eccezionale ma è fragile.
Spanish: Un metal único que se oxida con un rojo vivo. Zascosium tiene una alta reflectividad espectral cuando se pule y una dureza excepcional, pero es frágil.

English: Chunks of broken stone with trace amounts of several common metals.
Deutsch: Schotterbrocken mit Spuren mehrerer unedler Metalle.
Français: Des morceaux de pierre cassée avec des traces de plusieurs métaux communs.
Italiano: Pezzi di pietra rotta con tracce di diversi metalli comuni.
Spanish: Trozos de piedra rota con trazas de varios metales comunes.

English: A fine powder made from crushed stone used as a binder in concrete.
Deutsch: Ein feines Pulver aus Schotter, das als Bindemittel in Beton verwendet wird.
Français: Une poudre fine fabriquée à partir de pierre concassée utilisée comme liant dans le béton.
Italiano: Una polvere fine a base di pietrisco usata come legante nel calcestruzzo.
Spanish: Polvo fino hecho de piedra triturada que se utiliza como aglutinante en hormigón.

English: A hazardous powdered form of Magnesium. Easily ignited it burns at over 3000 degrees and used in explosives and incendiary applications.
Deutsch: Eine gefährliche Pulverform von Magnesium. Leicht entzündlich brennt es bei über 3000 Grad und wird in Sprengstoffen und Brandanwendungen verwendet.
Français: Une forme de poudre dangereuse de magnésium. S'enflamme facilement, il brûle à plus de 3000 degrés et est utilisé dans les explosifs et les applications incendiaires.
Italiano: Una forma in polvere pericolosa di magnesio. Facilmente infiammabile, brucia a oltre 3000 gradi e viene utilizzato in applicazioni esplosive e incendiarie.
Spanish: Una forma peligrosa en polvo de magnesio. Se enciende fácilmente, se quema a más de 3000 grados y se usa en aplicaciones explosivas e incendiarias.

English: A rare-earth mineral comprised primarily of Zascosium. An element unique to the Andromeda Galaxy.
Deutsch: Ein Seltenerdmineral, das hauptsächlich aus Zascosium besteht. Ein einzigartiges Element der Andromeda-Galaxie.
Français: Un minéral de terre rare composé principalement de zascosium. Un élément unique à la galaxie d'Andromède.
Italiano: Un minerale delle terre rare composto principalmente da Zascosium. Un elemento unico nella galassia di Andromeda.
Spanish: Un mineral de tierras raras compuesto principalmente por Zascosium. Un elemento exclusivo de la galaxia de Andrómeda.

English: A radioactive mineral comprised primarily of Erestrum. An element unique to the Andromeda Galaxy.
Deutsch: Ein radioaktives Mineral, das hauptsächlich aus Erestrum besteht. Ein einzigartiges Element der Andromeda-Galaxie.
Français: Un minéral radioactif composé principalement d'Erestrum. Un élément unique à la galaxie d'Andromède.
Italiano: Un minerale radioattivo composto principalmente da Erestrum. Un elemento unico nella galassia di Andromeda.
Spanish: Un mineral radiactivo compuesto principalmente por Erestrum. Un elemento exclusivo de la galaxia de Andrómeda.

English: Scrap metal that can be melted down in a furnace for raw materials.
Deutsch: Altmetall, das in einem Ofen für Rohstoffe eingeschmolzen werden kann.
Français: Ferraille qui peut être fondue dans un four pour les matières premières.
Italiano: Rottami metallici che possono essere fusi in un forno per materie prime.
Spanish: Chatarra que se puede fundir en un horno para materias primas.

English: Silicate-based glass used in windows and optical lenses.
Deutsch: Glas auf Silikatbasis für Fenster und optische Linsen.
Français: Verre à base de silicate utilisé dans les fenêtres et les lentilles optiques.
Italiano: Vetro a base di silicato utilizzato nelle finestre e nelle lenti ottiche.
Spanish: Vidrio a base de silicato utilizado en ventanas y lentes ópticas.

English: Steel plates with a foamsteel core that provides improved impact resistance and durability.
Deutsch: Eine Stahlplatte mit einem Schaumstahlkern, der eine verbesserte Schlagfestigkeit und Haltbarkeit bietet.
Français: Une plaque d'acier avec un noyau en mousse d'acier qui offre une résistance aux chocs et une durabilité améliorées.
Italiano: Una piastra in acciaio con un nucleo in foamsteel che fornisce una migliore resistenza agli urti e durata.
Spanish: Una placa de acero con un núcleo de espuma de acero que proporciona una mayor resistencia al impacto y durabilidad.

English: A HSS steel alloy used in aerospace engineering for its high heat resistance and superior hardness.
Deutsch: Eine HSS-Stahllegierung, die in der Luft- und Raumfahrttechnik wegen ihrer hohen Wärmebeständigkeit und überlegenen Härte eingesetzt wird.
Français: Un alliage d'acier HSS utilisé dans l'ingénierie aérospatiale pour sa résistance thermique élevée et sa dureté supérieure.
Italiano: Una lega di acciaio HSS utilizzata nell'ingegneria aerospaziale per la sua elevata resistenza al calore e la durezza superiore.
Spanish: Aleación de acero HSS utilizada en ingeniería aeroespacial por su alta resistencia al calor y dureza superior.

English: Inert carbon-plastic tubes used to transport fluids and as a structural element in lightweight designs.
Deutsch: Inerte Kohlenstoff-Kunststoff-Rohre zum Transport von Flüssigkeiten und als Strukturelement in Leichtbaukonstruktionen.
Français: Tubes inertes en carbone-plastique utilisés pour transporter les fluides et comme élément structurel dans les conceptions légères.
Italiano: Tubi inerti di carbonio-plastica utilizzati per il trasporto di fluidi e come elemento strutturale in progetti leggeri.
Spanish: Tubos inertes de carbono-plástico utilizados para transportar fluidos y como elemento estructural en diseños ligeros.

English: A highly-efficient electric motor used in many devices with moving parts.
Deutsch: Ein hocheffizienter Elektromotor, der in vielen Geräten mit beweglichen Teilen verwendet wird.
Français: Un moteur électrique très efficace utilisé dans de nombreux appareils avec des pièces mobiles.
Italiano: Un motore elettrico ad alta efficienza utilizzato in molti dispositivi con parti in movimento.
Spanish: Un motor eléctrico de alta eficiencia utilizado en muchos dispositivos con partes móviles.

English: An advanced electromagnetic coil used for generating magnetic fields on a large scale.
Deutsch: Eine fortschrittliche elektromagnetische Spule zur Erzeugung von Magnetfeldern in großem Maßstab.
Français: Une bobine électromagnétique avancée utilisée pour générer des champs magnétiques à grande échelle.
Italiano: Una bobina elettromagnetica avanzata utilizzata per generare campi magnetici su larga scala.
Spanish: Una bobina electromagnética avanzada que se utiliza para generar campos magnéticos a gran escala.

English: An assortment of circuitboards, microchips and cables used in every electronic device.
Deutsch: Eine Auswahl an Leiterplatten, Mikrochips und Kabeln, die in jedem elektronischen Gerät verwendet werden.
Français: Un assortiment de cartes de circuits imprimés, de micropuces et de câbles utilisés dans chaque appareil électronique.
Italiano: Un assortimento di circuiti stampati, microchip e cavi utilizzati in ogni dispositivo elettronico.
Spanish: Una variedad de placas de circuito, microchips y cables utilizados en todos los dispositivos electrónicos.

English: An electrical component that interfaces between computer and electrical systems to regulate the throughput of power.
Deutsch: Eine elektrische Komponente, die eine Schnittstelle zwischen Computer und elektrischen Systemen darstellt, um den Stromdurchsatz zu regulieren.
Français: Un composant électrique qui fait l'interface entre l'ordinateur et les systèmes électriques pour réguler le débit d'énergie.
Italiano: Un componente elettrico che si interfaccia tra computer e sistemi elettrici per regolare la portata di potenza.
Spanish: Componente eléctrico que interactúa entre la computadora y los sistemas eléctricos para regular el rendimiento de la energía.

English: A dedicated computer hard drive used as the brain of many complex electronic systems.
Deutsch: Eine dedizierte Computerfestplatte, die als Gehirn vieler komplexer elektronischer Systeme verwendet wird.
Français: Un disque dur informatique dédié utilisé comme cerveau de nombreux systèmes électroniques complexes.
Italiano: Un disco rigido del computer dedicato utilizzato come cervello di molti sistemi elettronici complessi.
Spanish: Un disco duro de computadora dedicado que se utiliza como cerebro de muchos sistemas electrónicos complejos.

English: A heavy industrial capacitor module used in some devices to store and output large amounts of energy.
Deutsch: Ein schweres industrielles Kondensatormodul, das in einigen Geräten zum Speichern und Ausgeben großer Energiemengen verwendet wird.
Français: Un module de condensateur industriel lourd utilisé dans certains appareils pour stocker et produire de grandes quantités d'énergie.
Italiano: Un modulo condensatore industriale pesante utilizzato in alcuni dispositivi per immagazzinare e produrre grandi quantità di energia.
Spanish: Un módulo de condensador industrial pesado que se utiliza en algunos dispositivos para almacenar y generar grandes cantidades de energía.

English: An assortment of small metal components used in most mechanical devices.
Deutsch: Eine Auswahl kleiner Metallkomponenten, die in den meisten mechanischen Geräten verwendet werden.
Français: Un assortiment de petits composants métalliques utilisés dans la plupart des appareils mécaniques.
Italiano: Un assortimento di piccoli componenti metallici utilizzati nella maggior parte dei dispositivi meccanici.
Spanish: Una variedad de pequeños componentes metálicos utilizados en la mayoría de los dispositivos mecánicos.

English: A fiber optic cable used for data transmission and signal relay.
Deutsch: Ein Glasfaserkabel für die Datenübertragung und das Signalrelais.
Français: Un câble à fibre optique utilisé pour la transmission de données et le relais de signal.
Italiano: Un cavo in fibra ottica utilizzato per la trasmissione dei dati e il relè di segnale.
Spanish: Cable de fibra óptica utilizado para transmisión de datos y retransmisión de señales.

English: A radioactive crystalline mineral rich in Promethium. It can be refined in a constructor into a fine powder and pressed into pellets.
Deutsch: Ein radioaktives kristallines Mineral, das reich an Promethium ist. Es kann in einem Konstrukteur zu einem feinen Pulver raffiniert und zu Pellets gepresst werden.
Français: Un minéral cristallin radioactif riche en Prométhium. Il peut être raffiné dans un constructeur en une poudre fine et pressé en granulés.
Italiano: Un minerale cristallino radioattivo ricco di Promezio. Può essere raffinato in un costruttore in una polvere fine e pressato in pellet.
Spanish: Mineral cristalino radiactivo rico en prometio. Puede refinarse en un constructor en un polvo fino y prensarse en gránulos.

English: A copper-rich ore known as Bornite that can be processed into pure Copper using a Constructor or Furnace.
Deutsch: Ein kupferreiches Erz namens Bornit, das mit einem Konstruktor oder Ofen zu reinem Kupfer verarbeitet werden kann.
Français: Un minerai riche en cuivre connu sous le nom de Bornite qui peut être transformé en cuivre pur à l'aide d'un constructeur ou d'un four.
Italiano: Un minerale ricco di rame noto come Bornite che può essere trasformato in rame puro usando un costruttore o una fornace.
Spanish: Un mineral rico en cobre conocido como Bornita que se puede procesar en Cobre puro usando un Constructor u Horno.

English: A Neodymium-rich variant of Bastnasite that can be refined into pure Neodymium with a Constructor or Furnace.
Deutsch: Eine neodymreiche Variante von Bastnasit, die mit einem Konstruktor oder Ofen zu reinem Neodym veredelt werden kann.
Français: Une variante riche en néodyme de Bastnasite qui peut être raffinée en néodyme pur avec un constructeur ou un four.
Italiano: Una variante ricca di neodimio di Bastnasite che può essere raffinata in puro neodimio con un costruttore o una fornace.
Spanish: Una variante de Bastnasita rica en neodimio que se puede refinar en neodimio puro con un constructor o un horno.

English: A common crystalline mineral known as Quartzite. A vital source of pure Silicon when processed in a Constructor or Furnace.
Deutsch: Ein übliches kristallines Mineral, bekannt als Quarzit. Eine wichtige Quelle für reines Silizium bei der Verarbeitung in einem Konstruktor oder Ofen.
Français: Un minéral cristallin commun connu sous le nom de quartzite. Une source vitale de silicium pur lorsqu'elle est traitée dans un constructeur ou un four.
Italiano: Un comune minerale cristallino noto come quarzite. Una fonte vitale di silicio puro quando lavorato in un costruttore o in una fornace.
Spanish: Un mineral cristalino común conocido como cuarcita. Una fuente vital de silicio puro cuando se procesa en un constructor u horno.

English: A mineral-rich ore consisting primarily of Cobalt that can be refined in a Constructor or Furnace.
Deutsch: Ein mineralreiches Erz, das hauptsächlich aus Kobalt besteht und in einem Konstruktor oder Ofen raffiniert werden kann.
Français: Un minerai riche en minéraux constitué principalement de cobalt qui peut être raffiné dans un constructeur ou un four.
Italiano: Un minerale ricco di minerali costituito principalmente da cobalto che può essere raffinato in un costruttore o in una fornace.
Spanish: Un mineral rico en minerales que consta principalmente de cobalto que se puede refinar en un constructor u horno.

English: A dense ore known as Magnetite that consists primarily of iron that can be refined in a Constructor or Furnace.
Deutsch: Ein dichtes Erz, bekannt als Magnetit, das hauptsächlich aus Eisen besteht, das in einem Konstruktor oder Ofen raffiniert werden kann.
Français: Un minerai dense connu sous le nom de magnétite qui se compose principalement de fer qui peut être raffiné dans un constructeur ou un four.
Italiano: Un minerale denso noto come Magnetite che consiste principalmente di ferro che può essere raffinato in un Costruttore o in una Fornace.
Spanish: Un mineral denso conocido como magnetita que consiste principalmente en hierro que se puede refinar en un constructor u horno.

English: A variant of Magnesite. This ore can be processed in a constructor into a powder used primarily in incendiary and explosive weapons.
Deutsch: Eine Variante von Magnesit. Dieses Erz kann in einem Konstrukteur zu einem Pulver verarbeitet werden, das hauptsächlich in Brand- und Sprengwaffen verwendet wird.
Français: Une variante de la magnésite. Ce minerai peut être transformé dans un constructeur en une poudre utilisée principalement dans les armes incendiaires et explosives.
Italiano: Una variante della Magnesite. Questo minerale può essere trasformato in un costruttore in una polvere utilizzata principalmente nelle armi incendiarie ed esplosive.
Spanish: Una variante de Magnesita. Este mineral se puede procesar en un constructor en un polvo que se utiliza principalmente en armas incendiarias y explosivas.

English: A set of complex electronics reinforced for use in extreme environments. Used in high-end devices and manufacturing.
Deutsch: Eine Reihe komplexer Elektronikgeräte, die für den Einsatz in extremen Umgebungen verstärkt wurden. Wird in High-End-Geräten und in der Fertigung verwendet.
Français: Un ensemble d'électronique complexe renforcé pour une utilisation dans des environnements extrêmes. Utilisé dans les appareils et la fabrication haut de gamme.
Italiano: Un set di elettronica complessa rinforzata per l'uso in ambienti estremi. Utilizzato in dispositivi e produzione di fascia alta.
Spanish: Un conjunto de componentes electrónicos complejos reforzados para su uso en entornos extremos. Utilizado en dispositivos y fabricación de alta gama.

English: Raw composite that can be refined with igneous stone dust to form Basalt Fiber. A fireproof and lightweight building material.
Deutsch: Roher Verbundstoff, der mit magmatischem Steinstaub zu Basaltfasern veredelt werden kann. Ein feuerfester und leichter Baustoff.
Français: Composite brut qui peut être raffiné avec de la poussière de pierre ignée pour former de la fibre de basalte. Un matériau de construction ignifuge et léger.
Italiano: Composito grezzo che può essere raffinato con polvere di pietra ignea per formare fibra di basalto. Un materiale da costruzione ignifugo e leggero.
Spanish: Compuesto crudo que se puede refinar con polvo de piedra ígnea para formar fibra de basalto. Un material de construcción ligero e ignífugo.

English: A dense mineral ore rich in exotic metals with high amounts of Sathium. A metal unique to the Andromeda Galaxy.
Deutsch: Ein dichtes Mineralerz, reich an exotischen Metallen mit hohen Mengen an Sathium. Ein Metall, das es nur in der Andromeda-Galaxie gibt.
Français: Un minerai minéral dense riche en métaux exotiques avec de grandes quantités de Sathium. Un métal unique à la galaxie d'Andromède.
Italiano: Un minerale denso ricco di metalli esotici con elevate quantità di Sathium. Un metallo unico nella galassia di Andromeda.
Spanish: Un mineral denso rico en metales exóticos con altas cantidades de Satio. Un metal exclusivo de la galaxia de Andrómeda.

English: An extremely hard and durable metal with many similarities to Tungsten. Sathium is used in armor plating and radiation shielding.
Deutsch: Ein extrem hartes und haltbares Metall mit vielen Ähnlichkeiten zu Wolfram. Sathium wird zur Panzerung und Strahlenabschirmung verwendet.
Français: Un métal extrêmement dur et durable avec de nombreuses similitudes avec le tungstène. Le Sathium est utilisé dans le blindage et le blindage contre les radiations.
Italiano: Un metallo estremamente duro e durevole con molte somiglianze con il tungsteno. Sathium è utilizzato nella placcatura dell'armatura e nella schermatura dalle radiazioni.
Spanish: Un metal extremadamente duro y duradero con muchas similitudes con el tungsteno. El sodio se utiliza en blindaje y protección contra radiación.

English: An electromagnetic coil array used for building up and releasing huge amounts of power.
Deutsch: Ein elektromagnetisches Spulenarray, das zum Aufbau und zur Freisetzung großer Mengen an Energie verwendet wird.
Français: Un réseau de bobines électromagnétiques utilisé pour accumuler et libérer d'énormes quantités d'énergie.
Italiano: Un array di bobine elettromagnetiche utilizzato per costruire e rilasciare enormi quantità di energia.
Spanish: Una matriz de bobinas electromagnéticas que se utiliza para generar y liberar grandes cantidades de energía.

English: A tank of compressed Hydrogen used as a coolant or as fuel for a Fusion Reactor.
Deutsch: Ein Tank mit komprimiertem Wasserstoff, der als Kühlmittel oder als Brennstoff für einen Fusionsreaktor verwendet wird.
Français: Un réservoir d'hydrogène comprimé utilisé comme liquide de refroidissement ou comme carburant pour un réacteur à fusion.
Italiano: Un serbatoio di idrogeno compresso utilizzato come refrigerante o come carburante per un reattore a fusione.
Spanish: Un tanque de hidrógeno comprimido utilizado como refrigerante o como combustible para un reactor de fusión.

English: Fibrous material obtained from trees that can be processed into numerous organic compounds.
Deutsch: Von Bäumen gewonnenes Fasermaterial, das zu zahlreichen organischen Verbindungen verarbeitet werden kann.
Français: Matière fibreuse obtenue à partir d'arbres pouvant être transformée en de nombreux composés organiques.
Italiano: Materiale fibroso ottenuto da alberi che può essere trasformato in numerosi composti organici.
Spanish: Material fibroso obtenido de árboles que se puede procesar en numerosos compuestos orgánicos.

English: A good old piece of wood you can use to make housing or furniture.
Deutsch: Ein gutes altes Stück Holz, aus dem Sie Wohnungen oder Möbel herstellen können.
Français: Un bon vieux morceau de bois que vous pouvez utiliser pour fabriquer des logements ou des meubles.
Italiano: Un buon vecchio pezzo di legno che puoi usare per realizzare abitazioni o mobili.
Spanish: Una buena pieza de madera vieja que puedes usar para hacer viviendas o muebles.

English: A mix of sand and gravel that when mixed with water will produce Concrete.
Deutsch: Eine Mischung aus Sand und Kies, die beim Mischen mit Wasser Beton erzeugt.
Français: Un mélange de sable et de gravier qui, lorsqu'il est mélangé avec de l'eau, produira du béton.
Italiano: Una miscela di sabbia e ghiaia che mescolata con l'acqua produrrà calcestruzzo.
Spanish: Una mezcla de arena y grava que al mezclarse con agua producirá Concreto.

English: A highly radioactive and unstable crystal that can be refined into an even more unstable form used in quantum technology.
Deutsch: Ein hochradioaktiver und instabiler Kristall, der zu einer noch instabileren Form verfeinert werden kann, die in der Quantentechnologie verwendet wird.
Français: Un cristal hautement radioactif et instable qui peut être raffiné en une forme encore plus instable utilisée dans la technologie quantique.
Italiano: Un cristallo altamente radioattivo e instabile che può essere raffinato in una forma ancora più instabile utilizzata nella tecnologia quantistica.
Spanish: Un cristal altamente radiactivo e inestable que se puede refinar a una forma aún más inestable que se utiliza en la tecnología cuántica.

English: Refined Pentaxid Crystals that are highly unstable and can be easily excited into releasing huge quantities of energy.
Deutsch: Raffinierte Pentaxid-Kristalle, die sehr instabil sind und leicht dazu angeregt werden können, große Energiemengen freizusetzen.
Français: Cristaux de pentaxide raffinés qui sont très instables et peuvent être facilement excités pour libérer d'énormes quantités d'énergie.
Italiano: Cristalli Pentaxid raffinati che sono altamente instabili e possono essere facilmente eccitati per rilasciare enormi quantità di energia.
Spanish: Cristales pentaxidos refinados que son muy inestables y pueden excitarse fácilmente para liberar grandes cantidades de energía.

English: Armor plates made from compressed Sathium with a foam-cell core for improved strength and durability.
Deutsch: Eine Panzerplatte aus komprimiertem Sathium mit einem Schaumzellenkern für verbesserte Festigkeit und Haltbarkeit.
Français: Une plaque de blindage en Sathium compressé avec un noyau en mousse pour une résistance et une durabilité améliorées.
Italiano: Una piastra di armatura realizzata in Sathium compresso con un nucleo di cellule di schiuma per una maggiore resistenza e durata.
Spanish: Una placa de armadura hecha de sodio comprimido con un núcleo de celda de espuma para mejorar la resistencia y durabilidad

English: A rare mix of igneous rock and native gold that can be refined into pure gold.
Deutsch: Eine seltene Mischung aus magmatischem Gestein und einheimischem Gold, die zu reinem Gold raffiniert werden kann.
Français: Un mélange rare de roche ignée et d'or natif qui peut être raffiné en or pur.
Italiano: Un raro mix di roccia ignea e oro nativo che può essere raffinato in oro puro.
Spanish: Una rara mezcla de roca ígnea y oro nativo que se puede refinar para convertirla en oro puro.

English: Universally accepted as currency. Gold is used in some electronics and spacesuit applications.
Deutsch: Universell als Währung akzeptiert. Gold wird in einigen Elektronik- und Raumanzuganwendungen verwendet.
Français: Universellement accepté comme monnaie. L'or est utilisé dans certaines applications d'électronique et de combinaison spatiale.
Italiano: Accettato universalmente come valuta. L'oro è utilizzato in alcune applicazioni di elettronica e tuta spaziale.
Spanish: Universalmente aceptado como moneda. El oro se utiliza en algunas aplicaciones de electrónica y trajes espaciales.

English: Embossed gold coins that can be exchanged for credits by inserting them into the coin slot on an ATM. Can also be melted down in a furnace.
Deutsch: Geprägte Goldmünzen, die durch Einlegen in den Münzschlitz eines Geldautomaten gegen Guthaben eingetauscht werden können. Kann auch in einem Ofen eingeschmolzen werden.
Français: Pièces d'or en relief qui peuvent être échangées contre des crédits en les insérant dans la fente pour pièces d'un guichet automatique. Peut également être fondu dans un four.
Italiano: Monete d'oro in rilievo che possono essere scambiate con crediti inserendole nella fessura per monete su un bancomat. Può anche essere sciolto in una fornace.
Spanish: Monedas de oro en relieve que se pueden canjear por créditos insertándolas en la ranura para monedas de un cajero automático. También se puede fundir en un horno.

English: A compact kit containing all the components required to assemble an electric hoverbike.
Deutsch: Ein kompaktes Kit mit allen Komponenten, die für die Montage eines Elektromotorrads erforderlich sind.
Français: Un kit compact contenant tous les composants nécessaires pour assembler une moto électrique.
Italiano: Un kit compatto contenente tutti i componenti necessari per assemblare una moto elettrica.
Spanish: Un kit compacto que contiene todos los componentes necesarios para montar una moto eléctrica.

English: The core component used in Automining technology responsible for non-destructive metal extraction.
Deutsch: Die Kernkomponente der Automatisierungstechnik, die für die zerstörungsfreie Metallgewinnung verantwortlich ist.
Français: Le composant de base utilisé dans la technologie Automining responsable de l'extraction non destructive des métaux.
Italiano: Il componente principale utilizzato nella tecnologia Automining responsabile dell'estrazione non distruttiva del metallo.
Spanish: El componente principal utilizado en la tecnología de automatización responsable de la extracción de metales no destructiva.

English: A case containing upgrade components for handheld firearms and personal tools.
Deutsch: Ein Koffer mit Upgrade-Komponenten für Handfeuerwaffen und persönliche Werkzeuge.
Français: Un coffret contenant des composants de mise à niveau pour armes à feu portatives et outils personnels.
Italiano: Una custodia contenente componenti di aggiornamento per armi da fuoco portatili e strumenti personali.
Spanish: Un estuche que contiene componentes de actualización para armas de fuego portátiles y herramientas personales.

English: A case containing upgrade components for rifles and advanced tools.
Deutsch: Ein Koffer mit Upgrade-Komponenten für Gewehre und fortschrittliche Werkzeuge.
Français: Un coffret contenant des composants de mise à niveau pour les fusils et les outils avancés.
Italiano: Una custodia contenente componenti di aggiornamento per fucili e strumenti avanzati.
Spanish: Un maletín que contiene componentes de actualización para rifles y herramientas avanzadas.

English: A case containing compensators for anti-material rifles so they don't break the wielder's shoulder.
Deutsch: Ein Koffer mit Kompensatoren für Anti-Material-Gewehre, damit sie dem Träger nicht die Schulter brechen.
Français: Un étui contenant des compensateurs pour les fusils anti-matériaux afin qu'ils ne cassent pas l'épaule du porteur.
Italiano: Una custodia contenente compensatori per fucili antimateriali in modo che non rompano la spalla del portatore.
Spanish: Un estuche que contiene compensadores para rifles antimaterial para que no rompan el hombro del portador.

English: A case containing replacement barrels and reloader for shotguns.
Deutsch: Ein Koffer mit Ersatzläufen und Nachlader für Schrotflinten.
Français: Un étui contenant des canons de rechange et un chargeur pour fusils de chasse.
Italiano: Una custodia contenente canne di ricambio e caricatore per fucili.
Spanish: Un estuche que contiene cañones de repuesto y cargador para escopetas.

English: A large container with precision parts for upgrading heavy weapons.
Deutsch: Ein großer Container mit Präzisionsteilen zum Aufrüsten schwerer Waffen.
Français: Un grand conteneur avec des pièces de précision pour la mise à niveau des armes lourdes.
Italiano: Un grande contenitore con parti di precisione per l'aggiornamento delle armi pesanti.
Spanish: Un gran contenedor con piezas de precisión para actualizar armas pesadas.

English: A padded case containing a sensitive laser focusing array used in high-powered lasers.
Deutsch: Ein gepolstertes Gehäuse mit einem empfindlichen Laserfokussierungsarray, das in Hochleistungslasern verwendet wird.
Français: Un boîtier rembourré contenant un réseau de focalisation laser sensible utilisé dans les lasers haute puissance.
Italiano: Una custodia imbottita contenente una matrice di messa a fuoco laser sensibile utilizzata nei laser ad alta potenza.
Spanish: Estuche acolchado que contiene una matriz de enfoque láser sensible que se utiliza en láseres de alta potencia.

English: Isolated into pure elemental Pentaxium form, this element has measurable levels of exotic matter and is key to all quantum technology.
Deutsch: Dieses Element ist in rein elementarer Pentaxiumform isoliert und weist messbare Mengen an exotischer Materie auf. Es ist der Schlüssel für alle Quantentechnologien.
Français: Isolé sous forme élémentaire pure de Pentaxium, cet élément a des niveaux mesurables de matière exotique et est la clé de toute technologie quantique.
Italiano: Isolato in pura forma elementare di Pentaxium, questo elemento ha livelli misurabili di materia esotica ed è la chiave di tutta la tecnologia quantistica.
Spanish: Aislado en forma de Pentaxium elemental puro, este elemento tiene niveles mensurables de materia exótica y es clave para toda la tecnología cuántica.

English: Frozen water that can be used as coolant or melted into drinkable water.
Deutsch: Gefrorenes Wasser, das als Kühlmittel verwendet oder zu Trinkwasser geschmolzen werden kann.
Français: Eau glacée pouvant être utilisée comme liquide de refroidissement ou fondue en eau potable.
Italiano: Acqua congelata che può essere utilizzata come refrigerante o sciolta in acqua potabile.
Spanish: Agua congelada que puede usarse como refrigerante o derretirse en agua potable.

English: A mineral variant of Rutile. High in Titanium that can be processed in a Constructor or Furnace.
Deutsch: Eine mineralische Variante von Rutil. Reich an Titan, das in einem Konstruktor oder Ofen verarbeitet werden kann.
Français: Une variante minérale du rutile. Riche en titane qui peut être traité dans un constructeur ou un four.
Italiano: Una variante minerale del rutilo. Alto contenuto di titanio che può essere lavorato in un costruttore o in una fornace.
Spanish: Una variante mineral del rutilo. Alto contenido de titanio que se puede procesar en un constructor o en un horno.

English: Round ingots of Titanium used in many industrial applications and steel alloys.
Deutsch: Runde Titanblöcke, die in vielen industriellen Anwendungen und Stahllegierungen verwendet werden.
Français: Lingots ronds de titane utilisés dans de nombreuses applications industrielles et alliages d'acier.
Italiano: Lingotti rotondi di titanio utilizzati in molte applicazioni industriali e leghe di acciaio.
Spanish: Lingotes redondos de titanio utilizados en muchas aplicaciones industriales y aleaciones de acero.

English: Plates of Titanium metal with a foam metal core for added strength and durability with reduced weight.
Deutsch: Eine Platte aus Titanmetall mit einem Schaumstoffkern für zusätzliche Festigkeit und Haltbarkeit.
Français: Une plaque de métal titane avec un noyau en mousse métallique pour plus de résistance et de durabilité.
Italiano: Una piastra di titanio metallico con anima in metallo espanso per una maggiore resistenza e durata.
Spanish: Una placa de metal de titanio con un núcleo de espuma metálica para mayor resistencia y durabilidad.

English: A sedimentary variant of Bauxite. A source of Aluminium when refined.
Deutsch: Eine sedimentäre Variante von Bauxit. Eine Quelle von Aluminium, wenn es raffiniert wird.
Français: Une variante sédimentaire de la bauxite. Une source d'aluminium une fois raffinée.
Italiano: Una variante sedimentaria della bauxite. Una fonte di alluminio quando raffinata.
Spanish: Variante sedimentaria de bauxita. Fuente de Aluminio refinado.

English: Powdered Aluminium metal used in casting, electroplating, alloying and some incendiary devices.
Deutsch: Aluminiumpulver, das zum Gießen, Galvanisieren, Legieren und einigen Brandvorrichtungen verwendet wird.
Français: Métal d'aluminium en poudre utilisé dans le moulage, la galvanoplastie, l'alliage et certains dispositifs incendiaires.
Italiano: Metallo in polvere di alluminio utilizzato in fusione, galvanica, leghe e alcuni dispositivi incendiari.
Spanish: Metal de aluminio en polvo utilizado en fundición, galvanoplastia, aleación y algunos dispositivos incendiarios.

English: A thin foil of aluminium used in electronics and insulation.
Deutsch: Eine dünne Aluminiumfolie für Elektronik und Isolierung.
Français: Une fine feuille d'aluminium utilisée dans l'électronique et l'isolation.
Italiano: Un sottile foglio di alluminio utilizzato nell'elettronica e nell'isolamento.
Spanish: Lámina fina de aluminio utilizada en electrónica y aislamiento.

English: A dense metallic ore of Sperrylite. It's rich in platinum but is toxic due to high arsenic content. Must be processed in a furnace.
Deutsch: Ein dichtes Metallerz aus Sperrylit. Es ist reich an Platin, aber aufgrund des hohen Arsengehalts giftig. Muss in einem Ofen verarbeitet werden.
Français: Un minerai métallique dense de Sperrylite. Il est riche en platine mais est toxique en raison de sa forte teneur en arsenic. Doit être traité dans un four.
Italiano: Un denso minerale metallico di Sperrylite. È ricco di platino ma è tossico a causa dell'alto contenuto di arsenico. Deve essere lavorato in una fornace.
Spanish: Un mineral metálico denso de Sperrylite. Es rico en platino pero tóxico debido a su alto contenido de arsénico. Debe procesarse en un horno.

English: A valuable and extremely dense metal used in a variety of applications from catalysts to thruster shielding.
Deutsch: Ein wertvolles und extrem dichtes Metall, das in einer Vielzahl von Anwendungen verwendet wird, von Katalysatoren bis hin zur Abschirmung von Triebwerken.
Français: Un métal précieux et extrêmement dense utilisé dans une variété d'applications, des catalyseurs au blindage des propulseurs.
Italiano: Un metallo prezioso ed estremamente denso utilizzato in una varietà di applicazioni, dai catalizzatori alla schermatura del propulsore.
Spanish: Un metal valioso y extremadamente denso que se utiliza en una variedad de aplicaciones, desde catalizadores hasta blindaje de propulsores.

English: A dense platinum plate used in various applications for it's resistance to corrosion and friction.
Deutsch: Eine dichte Platinplatte, die in verschiedenen Anwendungen wegen ihrer Korrosions- und Reibungsbeständigkeit verwendet wird.
Français: Une plaque de platine dense utilisée dans diverses applications pour sa résistance à la corrosion et au frottement.
Italiano: Una piastra di platino densa utilizzata in varie applicazioni per la sua resistenza alla corrosione e all'attrito.
Spanish: Una placa de platino denso que se utiliza en diversas aplicaciones por su resistencia a la corrosión y la fricción.

English: A treated form of Erestrum to keep it in a semifluid state. Used primarily for plasma applications due to its low boiling point and magnetic properties.
Deutsch: Eine behandelte Form von Erestrum, um es in einem halbflüssigen Zustand zu halten. Wird aufgrund seines niedrigen Siedepunkts und seiner magnetischen Eigenschaften hauptsächlich für Plasmaanwendungen verwendet.
Français: Une forme traitée d'Erestrum pour le maintenir dans un état semi-fluide. Utilisé principalement pour les applications plasma en raison de son point d'ébullition bas et de ses propriétés magnétiques.
Italiano: Una forma trattata di Erestrum per mantenerlo in uno stato semifluido. Utilizzato principalmente per applicazioni al plasma grazie al suo basso punto di ebollizione e alle proprietà magnetiche.
Spanish: Una forma tratada de Erestrum para mantenerlo en un estado semifluido. Se utiliza principalmente para aplicaciones de plasma debido a su bajo punto de ebullición y propiedades magnéticas.

English: An alloy of Zascosium and Erestrum that exhibits both Zascosium's strength with Erestrum's conductivity. Used in superconductors.
Deutsch: Eine Legierung aus Zascosium und Erestrum, die sowohl die Stärke von Zascosium als auch die Leitfähigkeit von Erestrum aufweist. Wird in Supraleitern verwendet.
Français: Un alliage de Zascosium et d'Erestrum qui présente à la fois la force de Zascosium et la conductivité d'Erestrum. Utilisé dans les supraconducteurs.
Italiano: Una lega di Zascosium ed Erestrum che mostra sia la forza di Zascosium che la conduttività di Erestrum. Utilizzato nei superconduttori.
Spanish: Una aleación de Zascosium y Erestrum que exhibe la fuerza de Zascosium con la conductividad de Erestrum. Utilizado en superconductores.

English: Inert alien biomatter that exhibits both organic and synthetic characteristics with extreme resilience and easy malleability.
Deutsch: Inerte fremde Biomatter, die sowohl organische als auch synthetische Eigenschaften mit extremer Elastizität und leichter Formbarkeit aufweist.
Français: Biomate extraterrestre inerte qui présente des caractéristiques à la fois organiques et synthétiques avec une résilience extrême et une malléabilité facile.
Italiano: Biomateria aliena inerte che presenta caratteristiche sia organiche che sintetiche con estrema resilienza e facile malleabilità.
Spanish: Biomateria alienígena inerte que exhibe características tanto orgánicas como sintéticas con extrema resiliencia y fácil maleabilidad.

English: A highly flammable compound used in smokeless propellant charges and ammunition.
Deutsch: Eine leicht entzündliche Verbindung, die in rauchfreien Treibladungen und Munition verwendet wird.
Français: Composé hautement inflammable utilisé dans les charges propulsives sans fumée et les munitions.
Italiano: Un composto altamente infiammabile utilizzato in cariche propellenti senza fumo e munizioni.
Spanish: Un compuesto altamente inflamable que se utiliza en cargas y municiones propulsoras sin humo.

English: A complex computing component used in advanced CPUs.
Deutsch: Eine komplexe Computerkomponente, die in fortschrittlichen CPUs verwendet wird.
Français: Un composant informatique complexe utilisé dans les processeurs avancés.
Italiano: Un componente di elaborazione complesso utilizzato nelle CPU avanzate.
Spanish: Un componente informático complejo utilizado en CPU avanzadas.

Français: Kit de mise à niveau de petite tourelle
Spanish: Kit de actualización de torreta pequeña
Portuguese (Euro): Kit de atualização de torre pequena

Français: Kit de mise à niveau de grande tourelle
Spanish: Kit de actualización de torreta grande
Portuguese (Euro): Kit de atualização de torre grande

Français: Kit de mise à niveau avancé de la tourelle
Spanish: Kit de actualización de torreta avanzada
Portuguese (Euro): Kit de atualização de torre avançada

English: Salvages owned and public structures.\nWill return 50% of a block's components.
Deutsch: Zerlegt eigene und öffentliche Strukturen.\nGibt 50% der Komponenten eines Blocks zurück.
Français: Désassemble les structures publiques et privées. Restitue les composants mais pas les blocs.
Italiano: Smonta blocchi di strutture proprie e pubbliche. Restituisce sempre i componenti.
Spanish: Desmontar estructuras propias y públicas. Siempre devolverá los componentes.
Portuguese (Euro): Desconstruir estruturas próprias e públicas. Irá sempre devolver componentes.
Portuguese (Brazil): Desconstruir estruturas próprias e públicas. Sempre retornará os componentes.

English: Salvages owned and public structures.\nWill return 75% of a block's components.
Deutsch: Zerlegt eigene und öffentliche Strukturen.\nGibt 75% der Komponenten eines Blocks zurück.
Français: Désassemble les structures publiques et privées. Restitue les composants mais pas les blocs.
Italiano: Smonta blocchi di strutture proprie e pubbliche. Restituisce sempre i componenti.
Spanish: Desmontar estructuras propias y públicas. Siempre devolverá los componentes.
Portuguese (Euro): Desconstruir estruturas próprias e públicas. Irá sempre devolver componentes.
Portuguese (Brazil): Desconstruir estruturas próprias e públicas. Sempre retornará os componentes.

English: A Polaris-Manufactured Radioisotope Thermoelectric Generator.\nProduces a constant output of up to 3kW without consuming any fuel. Exceeding 3kW will consume Promethium fuel up to an additional 1000W.\n[c][FF0000]Once installed, the RTG cannot be removed intact.[-][/c]
Deutsch: Ein von Polaris hergestellter thermoelektrischer Radioisotop-Generator.\nErzeugt eine konstante Leistung von bis zu 2 kW ohne Kraftstoff zu verbrauchen. Bei mehr als 2 kW wird Promethium-Brennstoff bis zu 500 W zusätzlich verbraucht.\n[c][FF0000]Nach der Installation kann das RTG nicht mehr intakt entfernt werden.[-][/c]
Français: Un générateur thermoélectrique à radio-isotope fabriqué par Polaris.\nProduit une puissance constante jusqu'à 2 kW sans consommer de carburant. Au-delà de 2 kW, le carburant Promethium consommera jusqu'à 500 W supplémentaires.\n[c][FF0000]Une fois installé, le RTG ne peut pas être retiré intact.[-][/c]
Italiano: Un generatore termoelettrico a radioisotopi prodotto da Polaris.\nProduce una potenza costante fino a 2kW senza consumare carburante. Superare i 2kW consumerà carburante Promezio fino a un ulteriore 500W.\n[c][FF0000]Una volta installato, l'RTG non può essere rimosso intatto.[-][/c]
Spanish: Un generador termoeléctrico de radioisótopos fabricado por Polaris.\nProduce una salida constante de hasta 2 kW sin consumir combustible. Exceder 2kW consumirá combustible de prometio hasta 500W adicionales.\n[c] [FF0000] Una vez instalado, el RTG no se puede quitar intacto. [-] [/c]

English: Some kind of unstable material that's a synthesis of both organic and synthetic. It's still... active and alive. I don't think I should touch it.\n[c][00AAFF]Reactive Xenomatter can be deconstructed into inactive Xenomaterial for use in Xenosteel.[-][/c]
Deutsch: Eine Art instabiles Material, das eine Synthese aus organischem und synthetischem Material ist. Es ist immer noch... aktiv und lebendig. Ich glaube nicht, dass ich es anfassen sollte.\n[c][00AAFF]Reaktives Xenomatter kann für die Verwendung in Xenosteel in inaktives Xenomaterial zerlegt werden.[-][/c]
Français: Une sorte de matériau instable qui est une synthèse à la fois organique et synthétique. Il est toujours... actif et vivant. Je ne pense pas que je devrais y toucher.\n[c][00AAFF]Le Xenomatter réactif peut être déconstruit en Xenomaterial inactif pour être utilisé dans Xenosteel.[-][/c]
Italiano: Una specie di materiale instabile che è una sintesi sia di organico che di sintetico. È ancora... attivo e vivo. Non credo che dovrei toccarlo.\n[c][00AAFF]La xenomateria reattiva può essere decostruita in xenomateriale inattivo per l'uso in Xenosteel.[-][/c]
Spanish: Algún tipo de material inestable que es una síntesis de lo orgánico y lo sintético. Todavía está ... activo y vivo. No creo que deba tocarlo.\n[c][00AAFF]El Xenomatter reactivo se puede deconstruir en Xenomaterial inactivo para su uso en Xenosteel.[-][/c]

English: A standard-issue 9mm sidearm for UCH personnel for defense.\n[c][00AAFF]Rated for underwater use[-][/c]
The FW-9 Wasp utilizes magnetic coils to accelerate bullets to supersonic speeds, giving it superior stopping power for a smaller magazine.\n[c][00AAFF]Rated for underwater use[-][/c]

An improved semi-automatic Heavy Pistol developed by the Zirax after examining UCH weapons retrieved from the Titan's Wreckage.\n[c][FF0000]The technology to repair this weapon does not exist yet.[-][/c]
A specialist Heavy Pistol chambered in high-powered .50 AE that was typically presented to new UCH Captains but have become a favored sidearm of Zirax Commanders.
Utilizing a pulsed laser array this weapon can produce collimated hard light beams that ignore atmospheric density and deal extreme thermal damage to the target.
Utilizing a pulsed laser array this weapon can produce collimated hard light beams that ignore atmospheric density and deal extreme thermal damage to the target.

An improved Laser Blaster developed by the Zirax after examining UCH weapons retrieved from the Titan's Wreckage.\n[c][00BB00]Can fire Concussive Shockwaves with RMB[-][/c]\n[c][FF0000]The technology to repair this weapon does not exist yet.[-][/c]
Deutsch: Ein verbesserter Laserblaster, der von den Zirax entwickelt wurde, nachdem UCH-Waffen untersucht wurden, die aus dem Wrack des Titans geborgen wurden.\n[c][FF0000]Die Technologie zum Reparieren dieser Waffe existiert noch nicht.[-][/c]
Français: Un Laser Blaster amélioré développé par le Zirax après avoir examiné les armes UCH récupérées dans l'épave du Titan.\n[c][FF0000]La technologie pour réparer cette arme n'existe pas encore.[-][/c]
Italiano: Un Laser Blaster migliorato sviluppato dallo Zirax dopo aver esaminato le armi UCH recuperate dal Relitto del Titano.\n[c][FF0000]La tecnologia per riparare quest'arma non esiste ancora.[-][/c]

English: A basic pump-action shotgun that's standard issue for UCH tactical personnel in close quarters combat.
An advanced semi-automatic combat shotgun used by elite UCH personnel for close quarters combat. It has a larger magazine and more stopping power than it's standard issue counterpart.

An advanced fully-automatic assault shotgun developed by the Zirax after examining UCH weapons retrieved from the Titan's Wreckage.\n[c][FF0000]The technology to repair this weapon does not exist yet.[-][/c]
A standard-issue zirax shotgun. It boasts considerable firepower at close ranges and seems to be compatible with regular shotgun ammunition but it doesn't seem that it can be repaired.

A standard-issue zirax laser rifle equipped with a long-range scope. While slower than the UCH's version, the zirax weapon boasts significant firepower on a per-shot basis but doesn't seem to be repairable.
A fully-automatic combat rifle used by UCH military personnel as the standard-issue weapon.
An improved fully-automatic combat rifle with a scope and a faster repeating cycle used by UCH military personnel.
A fully-automatic plasma rifle developed by the Zirax after examining UCH weapons retrieved from the Titan's Wreckage.\n[c][FF0000]The technology to repair this weapon does not exist yet.
An advanced light machine gun developed by the Zirax after examining UCH weapons retrieved from the Titan's Wreckage.\n[c][FF0000]The technology to repair this weapon does not exist yet.[-][/c]
A zirax heavy assault rifle. It appears to be compatible with the larger 7.62x51mm rounds but it's not going to be possible to repair it.
A long ranged anti-personnel rifle chambered in 7.62mm with a telescopic sight that has become the standard LRSW of the UCH.
A long ranged rifle with advanced telescopic sights, aim stabilizers and chambered in 7.62, allowing longer shots with more penetrative power against armored targets.

An advanced anti-materiel sniper rifle chambered in .50 BMG developed by the Zirax after examining UCH weapons retrieved from the Titan's Wreckage.\n[c][FF0000]The technology to repair this weapon does not exist yet.[-][/c]
A composite Crossbow with a Thorn oak stock, Scope, and bow limbs of a surprisingly advanced composite material of Tal'on Design.\n[c][00AAFF]Can be used underwater[-][/c]
A lightweight scoped rifle used by Zirax marksmen. It appears to be compatible with standard 7.62mm rounds but it's not going to be possible to repair it.
Utilizing a pulsed laser array this weapon can produce collimated hard light beams that ignore atmospheric density and deal extreme thermal damage to the target.
A superior plasma rifle developed by the Zirax after examining UCH weapons retrieved from the Titan's Wreckage.\n[c][FF0000]The technology to repair this weapon does not exist yet.[-][/c]
A marvel of Tal'on Engineering. The Plasma Crossbow launches metal quarrels sheathed in super-heated plasma using electromagnetic force managed by the Crossbow String.
A light 9mm Submachine Gun used by UCH security personnel and covert operatives with low penetrative power but high rate of fire.\n[c][00AAFF]Rated for underwater use[-][/c]
An improved Submachine Gun used by UCH security personnel and covert operatives with low penetrative power but high rate of fire.\n[c][00AAFF]Rated for underwater use[-][/c]
A laser-based Submachine Gun developed by the Zirax after examining UCH weapons retrieved from the Titan's Wreckage.\n[c][FF0000]The technology to repair this weapon does not exist yet.[-][/c]
Deutsch: Eine PDW-Maschinenpistole, die von Zirax entwickelt wurde, nachdem UCH-Waffen untersucht wurden, die aus dem Wrack des Titans geborgen wurden.\n[c][FF0000]Die Technologie zur Reparatur dieser Waffe existiert noch nicht.[-][/c]
Français: Une mitraillette PDW développée par le Zirax après avoir examiné les armes UCH récupérées dans l'épave du Titan.\n[c][FF0000]La technologie pour réparer cette arme n'existe pas encore.[-][/c]
Italiano: Una mitragliatrice PDW sviluppata dallo Zirax dopo aver esaminato le armi UCH recuperate dal Relitto del Titano.\n[c][FF0000]La tecnologia per riparare quest'arma non esiste ancora.[-][/c]
Spanish: Una metralleta PDW desarrollada por Zirax después de examinar las armas de la UCH recuperadas de los restos del Titán.\n[c][FF0000]La tecnología para reparar esta arma aún no existe.[-][/c]

English: A portable, multi-barreled rotary cannon chambered in 5.56mm for manned weapon emplacements based on the XM214 Microgun, rather than it's namesake.

A stabilized improvement of the standard Minigun with improved accuracy and reduced recoil at the cost of damaging the internal components irreparably.\n[c][FF0000]Hold LMB + RMB to fire at maximum speed.[-][/c]

An experimental rotary laser cannon developed by the Zirax after examining UCH weapons retrieved from the Titan's Wreckage.\n[c][FF0000]Hold LMB + RMB to fire at maximum speed.\nThe technology to repair this weapon does not exist yet.[-][/c]
A modified and enlarged MGL designed to operate using microrockets for anti-aircraft engagements or where the targets are protected behind armor.
An improved variant of Rocket Launcher designed to operate using laser-guided microrockets for anti-aircraft engagements where the targets are protected behind armor.

A refined version of the standard UCH Rocket Launcher developed by the Zirax after examining UCH weapons retrieved from the Titan's Wreckage.\n[c][FF0000]The technology to repair this weapon does not exist yet.[-][/c]
A lightweight shoulder-fired Rocket Launcher used by Zirax Rocket Troopers. Despite being designed for anti-aircraft uses, troopers regularly engage ground targets against regulations.
An experimental energy weapon that uses a concave laser array to superheat a cell of Erestrum Gel into plasma and propel it using electromagnetic fields towards a target.
An experimental plasma cannon developed by the Zirax after examining UCH weapons retrieved from the Titan's Wreckage.\n[c][FF0000]The technology to repair this weapon does not exist yet.[-][/c]
An upgraded flamethrower designed to reach further and burn hotter but requires specialized fuel that is corrosive to the firing mechanism.

[c][7dff7d]RMB[-][/c][c][ffffff] to set: Defense / Mining / Salvage.[-][/c]
- - [c][ffffff]
Check [u]selection wheel [/u]for information on operating modes.[-][/c]
- -[c][ffffff]
No ammo required.[-][/c]
Deutsch: Dieses Werkzeug dient der grundlegenden Verteidigung, dem Sammeln von Rohstoffen aus Felsen und der Bergung von Gebäuden. \nModus mit [c][44ff00]Rechter Maustaste[-][/c] wechseln.
Français: Outil utilisé pour la défense de base, la collecte de ressources sur les rochers et la récupération de structures. \Change de mode avec le [c][44ff00]bouton droit de la souris[-][/c].
Italiano:
[c][7dff7d]Mouse Dx[-][/c][c][ffffff] per impostare: Difesa / Estrazione / Recupero.[-][/c]
- - [c][ffffff]
Consulta la [u]ruota di selezione [/u]per maggiori informazioni sulle modalità.[-][/c]
- -[c][ffffff]
Non richiede munizioni.[-][/c]
Spanish: Herramienta utilizada para la defensa básica, la recolección de recursos de las rocas y la recuperación de estructuras. \N - Cambia de modo con [c][44ff00]el botón derecho del ratón[-][/c].
Russian: Инструмент, используемый для базовой обороны, сбора ресурсов с камней и спасения построек. \nСменить режим можно с помощью [c][44ff00]правой кнопки мыши[-][/c].
Japanese:
[c][7dff7d]RMB[-][/c][c][ffffff]: 防御 / 資源採掘 / 解体回収 を設定. [-][/c]
- -
[c][ffffff]動作モードについては, [u]選択ホイール[/u] にて確認してください. [-][/c]
- -
[c][ffffff]弾薬は必要ありません. [-][/c]
Chinese (traditional):
[c][7dff7d]滑鼠右鍵RMB[-][/c][c][ffffff] 來選擇: 防衛/採集/回收 .[-][/c]
- - [c][ffffff]
從 [u]功能選單 [/u]來了解相關模式的訊息.[-][/c]
- -[c][ffffff]
不需要彈藥.[-][/c]

English: An industrial tool used to cut down trees and as a close-combat weapon.\nRequires Biofuel in order to function.
Deutsch: Zum Fällen von Bäumen. Kann auch als Nahkampfwaffe benutzt werden.
Français: Utilisé pour couper du bois. Peut aussi être utilisé comme arme de combat rapproché.
Italiano: Attrezzo utilizzato per raccogliere la legna. Può essere utilizzato anche come arma da combattimento ravvicinato.
Spanish: Se utiliza para cortar madera. También se puede usar como arma de combate cuerpo a cuerpo.
Portuguese (Brazil): Usado para cortar madeira. Também pode ser usado como uma arma de combate próximo.
Russian: Используется для добычи древесины. Может также использоваться для оружия ближнего боя.
Japanese: 薪割りに使用. 接近戦用の武器としても使える.
Chinese (simplified): 用于砍伐木材。也可以用于近战搏斗（开局神器—译者注）。
Chinese (traditional): 用於砍伐木材。也可以用於近戰搏鬥（開局神器—譯者註）。
Greek: Χρησιμοποιείται για να ρήξεις κάτω ένα δέντρο. Μπορεί επίσης να χρησιμοποιηθεί σαν όπλο σε μία κοντινή μάχη.
Dutch: Gebruikt om hout te hakken. Kan ook als wapen voor korte afstandsgevechten worden gebruikt.
Vietnamese: Dùng để chặt gỗ. Cũng có thể được sử dụng cho một vũ khí chiến đấu gần.

English: A specialized injector gun for administering medical aid to an ally in the field.\n[c][00FF00]RMB to select treatments[-][/c]
A specialist combat rifle equipped with a suppressor and nightvision scope used by elite UCH tactical units for stealth missions.\n[c][00AAFF]Lower chance that troops will react to gunshots[-][/c]
40mm anti-personnel fragmentation grenades for use with standard-issue UCH Grenade Launchers.

A pentaxid-enhanced ballistic shell for destroying ground targets. Bombs inherit the speed of the vehicle that launched them and safely disarm if they exceed their target distance.
[c][00FF00]+100% Blast Damage vs Concrete
+50% Blast Damage vs Metal Hull Blocks
No Reload Delay[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]7,500 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]
A UCH multiple-grenade launcher designed to fire 40mm Grenades into enclosed spaces with grouped targets. Can be loaded with Frag Grenades, Gas Grenades or Incendiary Grenades.
A steel-tipped Crossbow Bolt of Tal'on design. It has indentations in the tip for the application of poison.
Unguided anti-personnel fragmentation rockets used as ammunition by most portable rocket launchers.
The 9x19mm parabellum is a rimless tapered firearms cartridge for Pistol, Submachine Gun, Heavy Pistol and Revolver use.
Rimless 8.3mm bottlenecked rifle cartridge designed exclusively for portable miniguns and some large-caliber rifles.
The 5.56x45mm NATO is a rimless bottlenecked intermediate cartridge family compatible with most standardized assault and combat rifles, as well as personal miniguns.
The 7.62x51mm NATO is a rimless bottlenecked rifle cartridge primarily used in designated marksman and sniper rifles along with many machine guns.
The 12.7x99mm NATO (also known as .50 BMG) is a Heavy Machine Gun and Anti-Materiel Rifle cartridge used as the standard round in ship-mounted rotary cannons and several Anti-Tank Rifles.
A Promethium-based Energy Cell compatible with any standard Plasma Drill that will fully charge the tool's capacitor.
Standard 00 Buckshot shells compatible with any UCH-issue shotgun and some pistol attachments.
A promethium-based Energy Cell compatible with any standard laser pistol that will fully charge the weapon's capacitors.\n[c][00AAFF]One charge will fill the weapon's entire clip[-][/c]
A pentaxid-based Energy Cell compatible with any standard laser rifle that will fully charge the weapon's capacitors.\n[c][00AAFF]One charge will fill the weapon's entire clip[-][/c]
A Promethium-based Energy Cell compatible with any standard Multitool that will fully charge the tool's capacitor.
An Erestrum plasma cell used as ammunition by portable plasma cannons.
A laser-guided rocket used by portable rocket launchers against enemy personnel and aircrafts.
A small plasma cell containing exotic elements that's used by some alien plasma weaponry.
Refined Ethanol designed to burn at higher temperatures for use in Flamethrowers.

A pressurized tank containing a thermite-laced form of napalm, used for defoliation and deforestation on vehicle-mounted flamethrowers.
[c][00FF00]+50% Blast Damage vs Wildlife and Ground Troops[-][/c]
[c][FF0000]No Damage to most non-combustible blocks[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]5,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]
A small reinforced steel tank that contains pure compressed O2. Can only be emptied into structure-mounted Oxygen Tanks.

Erestrum Gel suspended in a disposable metal casing that can be superheated with a cascade laser array. Used as ammunition in gunship-mounted plasma cannons.
[c][00FF00]+25% Blast Damage vs Armor Blocks[-][/c]
[c][FF0000]No Impact Damage[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]5,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]

Heavy ferrous Cobalt-tipped slugs used as ammunition in small bore Railguns. Possess superior penetration against armor but deflect harmlessly off shields.
[c][00FF00]+25% Impact Damage vs Armor Blocks
+50% Magazine Size
10% Shield Penetration[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]2,800 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]

Designed to be a low-collateral damage weapon for irregular warfare. The SGM-176 is standard use in space combat on all small crafts.
[c][00FF00]+200% Damage vs Entities
+25% Blast Damage vs Turrets and Weapons[-][/c]
[c][FF0000]+100% Reload Time[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]2,500 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]

30x113mm High Explosive autocannon rounds used in a variety of mobile and static cannons and turrets.
[c][00FF00]+25% Impact Damage vs Weapons, Turrets and Concrete
+100% Shield Damage vs Bases
+100% Magazine Size[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]5,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]

A pentaxid-based energy cell rated for small spacecrafts to recharge the capacitors in a Light Laser cannon. One cell will fully charge the capacitors.

[c][FF0000]-33% Damage vs Turrets and Weapons[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]10,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]

[c][FF0000]-33% Damage vs Turrets and Weapons[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]10,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]

155mm High-explosive anti-ship artillery shell designed for surface-mounted artillery cannons.
[c][00FF00]+25% Impact Damage vs Weapons, Turrets and Armor Blocks
+50% Blast Damage vs Concrete[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]10,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]

[c][FF0000]-10% Damage vs Turrets and Weapons[-][/c]

[c][FF0000]-10% Damage vs Turrets and Weapons[-][/c]

200% Damage vs Drones[-][/c]

[c][FF0000]No impact damage[-][/c]

+100% Blast Damage vs Drones
25% Shield Penetration[-][/c]

[c][FF0000]No Impact Damage[-][/c]

[c][FF0000]No Impact Damage[-][/c]

120x570mm Tank Ammunition is a semi-combustible cartridge used by 120mm smoothbore guns on most conventional tanks.

+50% Blast Damage vs HV/SV Armor Blocks[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]10,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]
A type of thermal laser capacitor used in Zirax laser weaponry. It's inefficient compared to UCH lasers but can be used in dense atmosphere.\n[c][00FF00]High Damage vs Energy Shields[-][/c]

Designed to be a low-collateral precision-guided missile for space-to-space combat. The SIM-9 is standard use in space combat on all small crafts.
[c][00FF00]+100% Impact Damage vs Entities
+25% Blast damage vs Thrusters[-][/c]
[c][FF0000]+100% Reload Time[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]2,500 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]

155mm High-explosive anti-ship artillery shell designed for ship-mounted artillery turrets.
[c][00FF00]+25% Impact Damage vs Weapons, Turrets and Armor Blocks
+50% Blast Damage vs Concrete[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]10,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]

The 158mm rolling airframe missile was originally designated for anti-aircraft and missile interception, they're perfectly capable of disabling enemy warships.
[c][00FF00]+25% Blast Damage vs Thrusters
200% Damage vs Drones[-][/c]
[c][FF0000]+100% Reload Time[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]5,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]
A disposable high-output capacitor cell designed to fit into a mobile pulse laser array. It is rated for 50 shots before it needs to be replaced.\n[c][00FF00]High Damage vs Energy Shields[-][/c]
A 133mm heat-seeking missile used by the Zirax navy for deployment from their warship missile turrets.\n[c][FF0000]Low Damage vs Energy Shields[-][/c]

A 180mm trans-atmospheric stabilized artillery shell with an Erestrum Plasma detonator used in Zirax artillery installations. It can be reused in any captured zirax turrets or deconstructed for components.\n[c][FFBB00]Medium Damage vs Energy Shields[-][/c]

The FIM-92S is an infrared-guided anti-aircraft missile used in hover vehicle-mounted missile turrets.
[c][00FF00]+100% Impact Damage vs Entities
+25% Blast damage vs Thrusters[-][/c]
[c][FF0000]+100% Reload Time[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]2,500 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]
Some kind of Plasma Cell used in specialized Zirax turrets that create an EMP shockwave on detonation. It can be reused or salvaged for components.\n[c][00FF00]High Damage vs Energy Shields[-][/c]
A hydrogen fuel cell used in a fusion reactor to initiate and sustain a fusion reaction.
A grilled steak made from processed meat. It looks tasty but I make no guarantees on the flavor.
It's some kind of unidentifiable meat. I wouldn't recommend eating this raw.
Dried Cobraleaves which has a smell and flavor similar to cinnamon with a hint of spiciness.
The fruit of the Opuntia cactus. Delicious and refreshing if a little sour.
Plant fibers that can be processed into a multitude of components from building blocks to ammunition.
A bottle of Akuan Wine made from Akuan Berries and artificially aged using a Food Processor. None of the class of a real Terran vintage of course.
A fleshy plant growth filled with a strong anesthetic sap possessing anti-bacterial and anti-microbial properties.
A gland retrieved from an alien creature that scans have identified to have medical uses if processed properly.
A hard mollusk-like growth whose body contains enzymes and poisons that can be diluted and processed for medical applications.
A big bowl of Dino Stew (may not contain actual dinosaur) complete with a variety of toppings and seasonings. This is the best meal around and it's best to eat it while it's hot.
Regular white bread with a nice crunchy crust on top that would be great as a sandwich.
A suspicious breed of fruit unique to the Andromeda galaxy. It should be safe to eat right?
Seemingly ordinary grain that's used to make bread and pastries. It's probably a bit hard to digest.
A mystery egg about the size of an Ostrich egg with a red yolk. I have no idea what animal it came from or IF it came from an animal. It's probably not a good idea to eat this raw.
A tough and extremely spicy root from the Varon plant. Possesses detectable concentrations of both a powerful stimulant and a muscle relaxant.
A toxic plant that has developed something similar to caffeine as a defense against being eaten by wildlife.
A sharp tooth of some unidentified alien creature. It appears to be hollow.
Some delicious spare ribs coated in special barbeque sauce. Why are these things so messy to eat?
A strange orange-like fruit. The zirax seem to eat them but I have no idea where they get them.
Apparently i'm going vegan because this is the saddest meat-free burger i've ever seen.
An advanced and unstable promethium fuel cell that utilizes hydrogen as a neutron moderator to contain a nuclear chain-reaction that would normally occur in this state.
A bottle of questionable milk. At least it's not blue...
A wedge of strong-smelling cheese that would probably be good with a bottle of wine or on a cheeseburger.
A bottle of Beer from TOP Brewery in the Andromeda Galaxy. It has enough alcohol in it to kill more than just brain cells.
A bottle of mineral fertilizer for growing plants and trees.
This used to be edible at one point. I wouldn't risk it anymore.

Herbal leaves with many medicinal uses when processed and concentrated.

[c][00FF00][b]Treats:[/b][-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF]Food Poisoning[-][c][FF0000] (50%)[-][/c]

An auto-injector loaded with a complex iodine-based drug that reduces the body's absorption of harmful radiation for 5 minutes.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]
A soft fibrous frond that has some medical applications.
A large and rich hard-boiled egg that's perfect for salads or on it's own.
A rare type of vegetable that's high in vitamins and antioxidants.
A poisonous fungus that contains extremely potent effects that rapidly stimulate healing but dangerously relaxes the muscles.

A resilient type of moss found to possess a powerful stimulant equal to medical-grade adrenaline.

[c][00FF00][b]Treats:[/b][-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF]Dermal Burn[-][c][FF0000] (50%)[-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF]Infected Wound[-][c][FF0000] (50%)[-][/c]

A dangerous variant of confetti moss that possess a neurotoxin when ingested causes extreme stress on the heart and muscles.

[c][00FF00][b]Treats:[/b][-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF]Fever[-][c][FF0000] (50%)[-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF]Poison[-][c][FF0000] (20%)[-][/c]
Military-issue ration packs. Like eating a boot with sauce...
A tough pod containing a protein-rich seed similar in consistency and flavor as broad beans.
A large container of untreated water that can be used as coolant or to extinguish a fire.\n\n[c][00FF00]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]
A bottle of purified water that will keep you cool and hydrated.\n\n[c][00FF00]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]
A type of large brown mushroom that may or may not have psychoactive properties.
A hollow needle with a point as fine as any hypodermic needle.

A yellow fruit covered in fat spikes that's extremely sour.

[c][00FF00][b]Treats:[/b][-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF]Poison[-][c][FFBB00] (50%)[-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF]Hangover[-][c][FFBB00] (75%)[-][/c]
A large mushroom with a spiny exterior.
A large starchy vegetable that has many culinary applications.
Fine powder made from grinding grain that's used in breads and pastries.
Here's a real burger with a nice fat meaty patty and cheese. Not a trace of a vegetable in sight.
Honey-glazed ham that's seasoned with salt and spices.
Looks like a can of baked beans. It should keep for a very long time.
I guess they have Spam in every galaxy. This stuff is slightly better than the kind we get back on Earth.
A sour type of berry unique to the Andromeda galaxy that's rich in anti-oxidants.
This is a real deep-dish pizza with all the toppings. Not that cheese-covered cardboard they have in some places.
A cut sandwich that's quick and easy to eat.
Salted and perfectly dried meat that's tough and chewy but will keep for a long time.
A spicy vegetarian dish that'll put heat in your belly and fire in your toilet.
Delicious fluffy waffles drizzled in synthetic maple syrup.
Chocolate chip cookies. A staple of any lunchbox regardless of whether you're a child or a soldier.
A standard ration bar with the consistency of a rolled up newspaper with as much flavor.\n\n[c][00FF00]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]
Lightly fried vegetables that are certainly more palatable than raw potatoes.
A bowl of grain cereal with milk. A good start to every day.
A sweet and slightly tart fruit pie that makes a perfect finish for any meal.
A cup of herbal tea that's good for settling an upset stomach or for keeping warm on a cold day.\n\n[c][00FF00]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]
A sticky and sweet substance harvested from the Ambersap Tendril. This is produced by the plant rather than the insects it attracts.
A bottle of fruit juice with extra pulp.\n\n[c][00FF00]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]
A bottle of pressed vegetable juice. It's certainly... different.\n\n[c][00FF00]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]
A bottle of pressed berry juice that's quite sour.\n\n[c][00FF00]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]
Tough starchy roots similar in texture and flavor to potatoes.\nPO-TAY-TOES. Boil 'em. Mash 'em. Stick 'em in a stew!
A strong stimulant drink that'll greatly boost your stamina.\n\n[c][00FF00]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]
Raw uncut diamonds made of carbon used in jewellery and industrial processes.
A container of various high-priced items from jewellery to designer clothing.
Chemical fertilizer used in commercial farming complexes and plantations.
A bottle of top shelf, distilled alcohol that fetches a high price on the market.
A cargo container full of medical ingredients and drugs.
Complex robotic components used in numerous machines and devices.
Optical electronic components including precision-lenses and scanning equipment.
Processed leather products ready to be made into quality items.
A barrel of unlabeled toxic waste. It could be radioactive or raw sewage.
A container of water treated with a variety of chemicals used as coolant in engines and reactors.
A container of chemicals. The label is coded so the contents are unreadable.
Air Filters used in air reprocessing, filtration and terraforming operations.
Replacement mechanical parts for some kind of device.
Advanced scanning equipment and lab supplies.
A biocontainer with an unknown alien substance inside.
Some kind of data storage device of Progenitor origin. It's unusually heavy for its size.
A container of corrosive waste left over from industrial processing that should be disposed of properly.
A cryogenically-sealed biocontainer containing an unrecognized viral strain. It goes without saying that the container should not be opened.
Digital tablets with a tactile interface used predominantly in home and business information panels.

A lightweight and compact shield generator design to ward off light armaments and meteorite impacts, but won't withstand heavy combat.\n[c][00BB00]Resists Kinetic weapons and Missiles, but susceptible to Lasers, Plasma and EMP.[-][/c]

A lightweight and compact shield generator design to ward off light armaments and meteorite impacts, but won't withstand heavy combat.\n[c][00BB00]Resists Kinetic weapons and Missiles, but susceptible to Lasers, Plasma and EMP.[-][/c]

The upgraded version of the Standard Shield Generator. It can deflect almost any kinetic weapon with minimal energy expenditure and withstand direct strikes from heavy plasma weaponry.\n[c][00BB00]Resists Kinetic weapons and Missiles, but susceptible to Lasers, Plasma and EMP.[-][/c]

A standard-issue Shield Generator designed to offer significant protection against kinetic and explosive impacts, but can be disrupted by energy-based weapons. Offers superior protection over the Compact Shield Generator.\n[c][00BB00]Resists Kinetic weapons and Missiles, but susceptible to Lasers, Plasma and EMP.[-][/c]
Deutsch: Ein standardmäßiger Schildgenerator, der erheblichen Schutz vor kinetischen und explosiven Einschlägen bietet, aber durch energiebasierte Waffen gestört werden kann. Bietet überlegenen Schutz gegenüber dem Compact Shield Generator.\n[c][00BB00]Widersteht kinetischen Waffen und Raketen, ist aber anfällig für Laser, Plasma und EMP.[-][/c]
Français: Un générateur de bouclier standard conçu pour offrir une protection significative contre les impacts cinétiques et explosifs, mais peut être perturbé par des armes à base d'énergie. Offre une protection supérieure par rapport au générateur de bouclier compact.\n[c][00BB00]Résiste aux armes cinétiques et aux missiles, mais sensible aux lasers, au plasma et aux EMP.[-][/c]
Italiano: Un generatore di scudi standard progettato per offrire una protezione significativa contro impatti cinetici ed esplosivi, ma può essere interrotto da armi a energia. Offre una protezione superiore rispetto al generatore di scudi compatti.\n[c][00BB00]Resiste alle armi cinetiche e ai missili, ma è sensibile a laser, plasma ed EMP.[-][/c]
Spanish: Un generador de escudo estándar diseñado para ofrecer una protección significativa contra impactos cinéticos y explosivos, pero que puede ser interrumpido por armas basadas en energía. Ofrece una protección superior al generador de escudo compacto.\n[c][00BB00]Resiste armas cinéticas y misiles, pero es susceptible a láseres, plasma y EMP.[-][/c]

English: A military-issue Shield Generator designed to offer superior protection against hostile attack over the Standard Shield Generator.\n[c][00BB00]Resists Kinetic weapons and Missiles, but susceptible to Lasers, Plasma and EMP.\n[-][/c]
Deutsch: Ein militärischer Schildgenerator, der überlegenen Schutz vor feindlichen Angriffen gegenüber dem Standard-Schildgenerator bietet.\n[c][00BB00]Widersteht kinetischen Waffen und Raketen, ist aber anfällig für Laser, Plasma und EMP.\n[-][/c]
Français: Un générateur de bouclier militaire conçu pour offrir une protection supérieure contre les attaques hostiles par rapport au générateur de bouclier standard.\n[c][00BB00]Résiste aux armes cinétiques et aux missiles, mais sensible aux lasers, au plasma et aux EMP.\n[-][/c]
