English: [c][00FF00]Increases Maximum CPU Limit[-][/c]\nSome form of computing hardware that appears to have originated from The Legacy. Although it seemingly has no limits, you should use with caution.\n[c][FF0000]The possession and use of Legacy Technology is forbidden under Galactic Law due to its corruptive nature.[-][/c]

[sup]A repurposed Disruptor Cannon extracted from the remains of a Legacy ship's internal autofactory. While not as powerful as a Legacy-controlled turret, it is still capable of dealing catastrophic damage to armor and weapon, though lacks the ability to penetrate shields.[/sup]\n[c][FF0000]Low Damage vs Energy Shields[-][/c]\n[c][FF0000]The possession and use of Legacy Technology is forbidden under Galactic Law due to its corruptive nature.[-][/c]

A ship-mounted Beam Cutter and Welder designed for the quick and precise salvage of space wrecks and the repair of surface damage. Although lacking the ability to accurately retrieve structural parts, it was deemed unnecessary since the sheer mass would render any ship immobile.\n[c][FF0000]Can Repair and Salvage Blocks (75% Salvage Rate)[-][/c]
A large-sized Cargo Container with logistics connectivity.\n[c][FFFFFF]Size:[-][/c] 4x4x4
A large-sized Harvest Container with logistics connectivity into which anything harvested with a Drill, Multiturret or Harvest module will be deposited.\n[c][FFFFFF]Size:[-][/c] 4x4x4

Light Armor provides protection from environmental and damage with an emphasis on mobility and functionality in everyday life.
Each suit includes a Jetpack (J), A headlight (L) and Oxygen Tanks.

[c][00FF00]Light Armor can be equipped from your Inventory but an Armor Locker is required to modify this suit.[-][/c]

Medium Armor provides good protection from the environment and damage with a good balance between mobility and defense, but doesn't excel in either aspect.
Includes a Jetpack (J), A headlight (L) and Oxygen Tanks.

[c][00FF00]An Armor Locker is required to equip or modify this suit.[-][/c]

Heavy Armor restricts mobility and oxygen capacity with denser plating in favor of unsurpassed protection from damage.
Includes a Jetpack (J), A headlight (L) and Oxygen.

[c][00FF00]An Armor Locker is required to equip or modify this suit.[-][/c]

Improved Light Armor is an upgraded version of the standard Light Armor. Providing additional carrying capacity, durability and an additional Booster Slot.
Light armor emphasizes mobility and functionality in everyday life over damage protection.

[c][00FF00]Light Armors can be equipped from your Inventory but an Armor Locker is required to modify this suit.[-][/c]

Improved Medium Armor is an upgraded version of the standard Medium Armor. It provides increased carrying capacity, durability and an additional Booster Slot.
Medium armors emphasize on a balanced performance between mobility and damage protection, but doesn't excel in either aspect.

[c][00FF00]An Armor Locker is required to equip or modify this suit.[-][/c]

Improved Heavy Armor is an upgraded version of the standard Heavy Armor that provides increased carrying capacity, durability and an additional Booster Slot
The armor is still restrictive and bulky but provides unsurpassed protection from combat damage at the cost of mobility and oxygen tank size.

[c][00FF00]An Armor Locker is required to equip or modify this suit.[-][/c]

Advanced Light Armor is the latest design in lightweight protection. Providing the maximum in carrying capacity, durability and full Booster Slots.
Light armor emphasizes mobility and functionality in everyday life over damage protection.

[c][00FF00]Light Armors can be equipped from your Inventory but an Armor Locker is required to modify this suit.[-][/c]

Advanced Medium Armor is the latest design in balanced, all-round protection. Providing the maximum in carrying capacity, durability and full Booster Slots.
Medium armors emphasize on a balanced performance between mobility and damage protection, but doesn't excel in either aspect.

[c][00FF00]An Armor Locker is required to equip or modify this suit.[-][/c]

Advanced Heavy Armor is the latest design in combat-ready apparel that provides the maximum in carrying capacity, durability and full Booster Slots.
With unsurpassed protection from weapons fire the drawbacks of poor mobility and oxygen tank size can be modded out.

[c][00FF00]An Armor Locker is required to equip or modify this suit.[-][/c]

Standard Light Armor customized with an AI Control Unit that can house IDA's Core, augmenting the suit's abilities with added processing power.
Functionally identical to Light Armor, but the added AI module provides additional radiation shielding and heating.

[c][00FF00]Light Armors can be equipped from your Inventory but an Armor Locker is required to modify this suit.[-][/c]

English: Solid cement aggregate blocks that are dense enough to resist the rigors of complex construction projects and the impacts of non-penetrating explosive and thermal weapons.\n[c][00FF00]Press RMB to see all block shapes[-][/c]\n[b][c][66CCFF]Structural Integrity:[/b][-][/c] 12
Deutsch: Feste Zementblöcke, die dicht genug sind, um den Härten komplexer Bauprojekte und den Einschlägen nicht durchdringender Spreng- und Wärmewaffen zu widerstehen.\n[c][00FF00]Drücken Sie RMB, um alle Blockformen zu sehen[-][/c] \n[b][c][66CCFF]Structural Integrity:[/b][-][/c] 12
Français: Blocs d'agrégats de ciment solides suffisamment denses pour résister aux rigueurs des projets de construction complexes et aux impacts des armes explosives et thermiques non pénétrantes.\n[c][00FF00]Appuyez sur RMB pour voir toutes les formes de blocs[-][/c]\n[b][c][66CCFF]Structural Integrity:[/b][-][/c] 12
Italiano: Blocchi di cemento solido sufficientemente densi da resistere ai rigori di complessi progetti di costruzione e agli impatti di armi esplosive e termiche non penetranti.\n[c][00FF00]Premi RMB per vedere tutte le forme dei blocchi[-][/c]\n[b][c][66CCFF]Structural Integrity:[/b][-][/c] 12

English: Solid cement aggregate blocks reinforced with an inner mesh of steel plates that will resist impacts of non-penetrating explosive and thermal weapons.\n[c][00FF00]Press RMB to see all block shapes[-][/c]\n[b][c][66CCFF]Structural Integrity:[/b][-][/c] 13
Deutsch: Massive Zementblöcke, verstärkt mit einem inneren Gitter aus Stahlplatten, die den Einschlägen von nicht durchdringenden Spreng- und Wärmewaffen widerstehen.\n[c][00FF00]Drücken Sie RMB, um alle Blockformen zu sehen[-][/c]\n[b][c][66CCFF]Structural Integrity:[/b][-][/c] 13
Français: Blocs d'agrégats de ciment solides renforcés d'un maillage interne de plaques d'acier qui résisteront aux impacts d'armes explosives et thermiques non pénétrantes.\n[c][00FF00]Appuyez sur RMB pour voir toutes les formes de blocs[-][/c]\n[b][c][66CCFF]Structural Integrity:[/b][-][/c] 13
Italiano: Blocchi di cemento solido rinforzati con una rete interna di piastre d'acciaio che resisteranno agli impatti di armi termiche e esplosive non penetranti.\n[c][00FF00]Premi RMB per vedere tutte le forme dei blocchi[-][/c]\n[b][c][66CCFF]Structural Integrity:[/b][-][/c] 13

English: Organo-synthetic mesh laid over steel, titanium and sathium reinforcement that provide superior strength at a lower mass, but lacks resistance against thermal weapons.\n[c][00FF00]Press RMB to see all block shapes[-][/c]\n[b][c][66CCFF]Structural Integrity:[/b][-][/c] 14
Deutsch: Organo-synthetisches Netz über Stahl-, Titan- und Sathium-Verstärkungen, das bei geringerer Masse überlegene Festigkeit bietet, aber keinen Widerstand gegen thermische Waffen hat.\n[c][00FF00]Drücken Sie RMB, um alle Blockformen zu sehen[-][/c]\n[b][c][66CCFF]Structural Integrity:[/b][-][/c] 14
Français: Maille organo-synthétique posée sur un renfort en acier, titane et sathium qui offre une résistance supérieure à une masse inférieure, mais manque de résistance contre les armes thermiques.\n[c][00FF00]Appuyez sur RMB pour voir toutes les formes de blocs[-][/c]\n[b][c][66CCFF]Structural Integrity:[/b][-][/c] 14
Italiano: Rete organica sintetica posata su rinforzi in acciaio, titanio e satio che forniscono una resistenza superiore a una massa inferiore, ma non hanno resistenza alle armi termiche.\n[c][00FF00]Premi RMB per vedere tutte le forme dei blocchi[-][/c]\n[b][c][66CCFF]Structural Integrity:[/b][-][/c] 14

English: Configurable wings with control surfaces to improve turning and lift in atmosphere.\n[c][00FF00]Improves Lift in atmosphere\nIncreases Torque Slightly[-][/c]
A coolant-lined superconducting cable made from a highly-refined Zascosium alloy mix designed to transfer power with zero transmission loss at the maximum possible speed.
A Sathium-reinforced composite plating comprised of several layers of different materials with varying radioactive modulus that's used on commercial warp drives and fusion reactors.
A carbon-fluorine superfluid is sealed inside the microscopic pores of each cell that maximizes energy capture and attenuation.\nUsed in the production of high-quality solar panels and satellites.
Drive thruster components used in the production of engines on long-haul freighters and battleships that are subject to higher stresses than normal thrusters.

A stable, crystalline form of carbon that possesses good conductive properties among others. It's both a precursor to industrial diamond production and the manufacture of graphene nanofiber material in high-end electronics.
Deutsch: Eine stabile, kristalline Form von Kohlenstoff, die unter anderem gute Leitfähigkeitseigenschaften besitzt. Es ist sowohl ein Vorläufer der industriellen Diamantproduktion als auch der Hersteller von Graphen-Nanofasermaterial in der High-End-Elektronik.
Français: Une forme stable et cristalline de carbone qui possède entre autres de bonnes propriétés conductrices. C'est à la fois un précurseur de la production industrielle de diamants et le fabricant de nanofibres de graphène dans l'électronique haut de gamme.
Italiano: Una forma stabile e cristallina di carbonio che possiede, tra le altre, buone proprietà conduttive. È sia un precursore della produzione industriale di diamanti che il produttore di materiale in nanofibra di grafene nell'elettronica di fascia alta.
Spanish: Una forma de carbono estable y cristalina que posee, entre otras, buenas propiedades conductoras. Es tanto un precursor de la producción industrial de diamantes como el fabricante de material de nanofibras de grafeno en la electrónica de alta gama.

English: A common and vital element used in everything from explosives to medical ingredients.\nAlthough common, it is always in demand throughout the galactic market.
Deutsch: Ein übliches und lebenswichtiges Element, das in allem verwendet wird, von Sprengstoffen bis hin zu medizinischen Inhaltsstoffen.\nObwohl es üblich ist, wird es immer auf dem gesamten galaktischen Markt nachgefragt.
Français: Un élément commun et vital utilisé dans tout, des explosifs aux ingrédients médicaux.\nBien que commun, il est toujours demandé sur tout le marché galactique.
Italiano: Un elemento comune e vitale utilizzato in tutto, dagli esplosivi agli ingredienti medici.\nAnche se comune, è sempre richiesto in tutto il mercato galattico.
Spanish: Un elemento común y vital que se usa en todo, desde explosivos hasta ingredientes médicos.\nAunque es común, siempre está en demanda en todo el mercado galáctico.

English: Flat-packed Prefab Housing modules commonly used in the wake of environmental disasters or during the construction period of outlying colonies.\nThey're not the most spacious or comfortable, but it's better than a tent.
The core module of a Fusion Reactor that contains not only the reaction chamber but the feed lines for the fuel, with enough shielding and coolant channels for use in compact generators.
Unknown electronic components that comprise the inner workings of quantum computers. The technology is formulated at the picoscopic level up, making it impossible to replicate or even understand.
An aluminium-palladium heat sink used to draw heat away from vital components and either disperse it or dump it into external coolant systems.
An essential mineral used in everything from food to agriculture and numerous industrial applications.\nAlthough not particularly valuable, it is always in demand throughout the galactic market.
Deutsch: Ein essentielles Mineral, das in allem von der Nahrung über die Landwirtschaft bis hin zu zahlreichen industriellen Anwendungen verwendet wird.\nObwohl es nicht besonders wertvoll ist, ist es auf dem gesamten galaktischen Markt immer gefragt.
Français: Un minéral essentiel utilisé dans tout, de l'alimentation à l'agriculture et dans de nombreuses applications industrielles.\nBien qu'il ne soit pas particulièrement précieux, il est toujours en demande sur tout le marché galactique.
Italiano: Un minerale essenziale utilizzato in tutto, dal cibo all'agricoltura e in numerose applicazioni industriali.\nAnche se non particolarmente prezioso, è sempre richiesto in tutto il mercato galattico.
Spanish: Un mineral esencial que se utiliza en todo, desde la alimentación hasta la agricultura y numerosas aplicaciones industriales.\nAunque no es particularmente valioso, siempre tiene una demanda en todo el mercado galáctico.

English: A packed and sealed case with standard equipment used by outlying colonies and mining rigs to extract resources from deep underground, beneath the bedrock layers.
A pressurized bottle of compressed helium typically used as fuel for low-yield Fusion Reactors and some older model thrusters that require propellant.
A pressurized bottle of liquid nitrogen, reinforced against the extreme cold of the fluid. It can be used to produce starship coolant and as a chemical agent in the use of fertilizers and explosives.
A pressurized bottle of compressed Xenon Gas used in laser production and precision machinery as well as several medical applications.
A packed and sealed container of communication equipment used in the establishment of long-ranged communications with outlying colonies and deep space FTL coms.

The ZMX-404 is in simpler terms: A landmine.\nThe construction is fundamentally similar to UCH munitions of the same class but contains an electronic safety that reacts only to zirax bio-signatures. This is renders the weapon useless if stolen since it cannot be repurposed easily.

Standard data extracted from a "secure" system that can be data-mined for sensitive information concerning civilian work orders, ship maintenance and economic data.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Can be sold to an Information Broker on some stations
Deutsch: Standarddaten, die aus einem "sicheren" System extrahiert werden, das nach sensiblen Informationen zu zivilen Arbeitsaufträgen, Schiffswartung und Wirtschaftsdaten durchsucht werden kann.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Kann an einigen Stationen an einen Informationsmakler verkauft werden
Français: Données standard extraites d'un système « sécurisé » pouvant être extraites des informations sensibles concernant les ordres de travail civils, la maintenance des navires et les données économiques.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Peut être vendu à un courtier en informations sur certaines stations
Italiano: Dati standard estratti da un sistema "sicuro" che possono essere estratti per informazioni sensibili relative a ordini di lavoro civili, manutenzione navale e dati economici.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Può essere venduto a un broker di informazioni su alcune stazioni

English: Scientific data extracted from a "secure" system that can be data-mined for sensitive information concerning biological, ecological and archaeological surveys.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Can be sold to an Information Broker on some stations
Deutsch: Wissenschaftliche Daten, die aus einem "sicheren" System extrahiert werden, das nach sensiblen Informationen zu biologischen, ökologischen und archäologischen Untersuchungen durchsucht werden kann.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Kann an einigen Stationen an einen Informationsmakler verkauft werden
Français: Données scientifiques extraites d'un système "sécurisé" pouvant être data-mining pour des informations sensibles concernant les études biologiques, écologiques et archéologiques.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Peut être vendu à un Information Broker sur certaines stations
Italiano: Dati scientifici estratti da un sistema "sicuro" che possono essere estratti per informazioni sensibili relative a indagini biologiche, ecologiche e archeologiche.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Può essere venduto a un broker di informazioni su alcune stazioni

English: Exploration data extracted from a "secure" system that can be data-mined for sensitive information concerning astronomic, geological and atmospheric data.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Can be sold to an Information Broker on some stations
Deutsch: Explorationsdaten, die aus einem "sicheren" System extrahiert wurden, das nach sensiblen Informationen zu astronomischen, geologischen und atmosphärischen Daten durchsucht werden kann.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Kann an einigen Stationen an einen Informationsbroker verkauft werden
Français: Données d'exploration extraites d'un système "sécurisé" qui peut être data-mining pour des informations sensibles concernant les données astronomiques, géologiques et atmosphériques.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Peut être vendu à un Information Broker sur certaines stations
Italiano: Dati di esplorazione estratti da un sistema "sicuro" che possono essere estratti per informazioni sensibili riguardanti dati astronomici, geologici e atmosferici.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Può essere venduto a un broker di informazioni su alcune stazioni

English: Security data extracted from a "secure" system that can be data-mined for sensitive information concerning sector-specific warp and weapon signatures.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Can be sold to an Information Broker on some stations
Deutsch: Sicherheitsdaten, die aus einem "sicheren" System extrahiert werden, das nach sensiblen Informationen zu sektorspezifischen Warp- und Waffensignaturen durchsucht werden kann.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Kann auf einigen Stationen an einen Informationsbroker verkauft werden
Français: Données de sécurité extraites d'un système « sécurisé » qui peut être extrait pour des informations sensibles concernant les signatures de distorsion et d'armes spécifiques au secteur.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Peut être vendu à un courtier en informations sur certaines stations
Italiano: Dati di sicurezza estratti da un sistema "sicuro" che possono essere estratti per informazioni sensibili relative a warp e firme di armi specifiche del settore.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Può essere venduto a un broker di informazioni su alcune stazioni

English: Military data extracted from a "secure" system that can be data-mined for sensitive information concerning military maneuvers, troop movements and surveillance.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Can be sold to an Information Broker on some stations
Deutsch: Militärdaten, die aus einem "sicheren" System extrahiert werden, das nach sensiblen Informationen über Militärmanöver, Truppenbewegungen und Überwachung durchsucht werden kann.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Kann auf einigen Stationen an einen Informationsbroker verkauft werden
Français: Données militaires extraites d'un système "sécurisé" pouvant être data-minées pour des informations sensibles concernant les manœuvres militaires, les mouvements de troupes et la surveillance.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Peut être vendu à un Information Broker sur certaines stations
Italiano: Dati militari estratti da un sistema "sicuro" che possono essere estratti per informazioni sensibili riguardanti manovre militari, movimenti di truppe e sorveglianza.\n\n[c][FFBB00]Può essere venduto a un broker di informazioni su alcune stazioni

English: Unstable, supersatured polycrystal of Pentaxium. If placed in a hydroponics unit with a supply of mineral solution it will grow and form larger crystals of Pentaxid.\n[c][FF00FF]Radioactive and Volatile. Drains power from structure grid while growing.[-][/c]
[c][b][FFBB00]DEHYDRATION[-][/b][/c]\nYou are dehydrated!\n[c][FFFFFF]Replenish your fluids by drinking water, juice or tea[-][/c]
Deutsch: Sie sind dehydriert!\nFüllen Sie Ihre Flüssigkeit durch Wasser, Saft oder Tee wieder auf!
Français: Vous êtes déshydraté!\nFaites le plein en buvant de l'eau, du jus ou du thé!
Italiano: Sei disidratato!\nRifornisci i tuoi liquidi bevendo acqua, succhi di frutta o tè!
Spanish: ¡Estás deshidratado!\n¡Repone tus líquidos bebiendo agua, jugo o té!

English: You have been poisoned!\nThe poison has spread through your body and can only be treated with Antitoxic Pills, Injections or a Detox Kit
Deutsch: Sie wurden vergiftet!\nDas Gift hat sich in Ihrem Körper ausgebreitet und kann nur mit antitoxischen Pillen, Injektionen oder einem Detox-Kit behandelt werden
Français: Vous avez été empoisonné !\nLe poison s'est propagé dans votre corps et ne peut être traité qu'avec des pilules antitoxiques, des injections ou un kit de désintoxication
Italiano: Sei stato avvelenato!\nIl veleno si è diffuso nel tuo corpo e può essere trattato solo con pillole antitossiche, iniezioni o un kit disintossicante
Spanish: ¡Te han envenenado!\nEl veneno se ha esparcido por tu cuerpo y solo se puede tratar con píldoras antitóxicas, inyecciones o un kit de desintoxicación.

English: Antibiotic salve that's applied topically to the affected area to seal and treat dermal burns and restore bloodflow to frostbitten tissue.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]
Broad-spectrum antibiotic pills used to treat a variety of systemic infections.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]

A high-strength Antibiotic Injector formulated for use against severe bacterial infections like Septicemia and Gangrene before they turn fatal.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]

A topical treatment for Radiation Burns designed to purge residual radiation from fatty tissue.
[c][00FFAA]Does NOT purge radiation from the body. Unless the radiation is removed by Decontamination or a Shower, symptoms may reappear.[-][/c]

[c][FFFFFF]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]

A formulated medical treatment using Iodine nano-particles for acute radiation exposue and subsequent Radiation Poisoning.
[c][00FFAA]Does NOT purge radiation from the body. Unless the radiation is removed by Decontamination or a Shower, symptoms may reoccur.[-][/c]

[c][FFFFFF]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]

High-strength medical treatment for food poisoning, indigestion, period pain and stomach cramps. If symptoms persist, see a doctor.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]

A unique medication used for filtering toxins, venom and harmful contaminants from the patient's blood without any adverse effects. Recommended for swamp and jungle environments where venomous creatures are common.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]

A complex anti-toxicity injection applied directly into the chest muscles, it counteracts numerous internal conditions by cleaning out build-ups of toxins and impurities in the blood typically caused by Kidney or Liver failure.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]
Extra-Large structural armor blocks used to produce elongated armor shapes made of steel.
Extra-Large structural armor blocks used to produce elongated armor shapes made of Titanium Alloy
Extra-Large structural armor blocks used to produce elongated armor shapes made of Sathium Alloy.

A high-value Platinum Credit Card issued by Trade Federation Banking. Each credit represents a total sum of 10,000 Credits that can be deposited into an ATM.\nMost businesses do not accept Platinum Credit.
Security Contract for a single security guard for static structures.\nPlaces the crewmember's bed from which they will be deployed.\nWill patrol the area and engage hostile targets.
A portable Security Android for static structures.\nPlaces the android's charging pad from which they will be deployed.\nWill patrol the area and engage hostile targets.
A Type-22 Deployable Heavy Mechanoid for militarized structures.\nPlaces the Mechanoid's charging pad from which they will be deployed.\nWill patrol the area and engage hostile targets.

A secondary capacitor dedicated to supplying reserve energy to a shield generator; increasing shield strength at the cost of shield charge speed.\n[c][00FF00]Increases Shield Capacity[-][/c]\n[c][FF0000]Reduces Shield Charge Rate[-][/c]
Deutsch: Ein Sekundärkondensator, der dazu bestimmt ist, einen Schildgenerator mit Reserveenergie zu versorgen; Erhöhung der Schildstärke auf Kosten der Schildladegeschwindigkeit.
Français: Un condensateur secondaire dédié à la fourniture d'énergie de réserve à un générateur de bouclier ; augmenter la force du bouclier au détriment de la vitesse de charge du bouclier.
Italiano: Un condensatore secondario dedicato a fornire energia di riserva a un generatore di schermatura; aumentando la forza dello scudo a scapito della velocità di carica dello scudo.
Spanish: Un condensador secundario dedicado a suministrar energía de reserva a un generador de pantalla; aumentando la fuerza del escudo a costa de la velocidad de carga del escudo.

English: A large auxillary capacitor bank used in larger vessels dedicated to supplying additional energy to a shield generator; increasing shield strength at the cost of shield charge speed.\n[c][00FF00]Increases Shield Capacity[-][/c]\n[c][FF0000]Reduces Shield Charge Rate[-][/c]

A primary capacitor that subsumes the role of a battleship's main power storage for shield generation; increasing shield strength at the cost of shield charge speed.\n[c][00FF00]Increases Shield Capacity[-][/c]\n[c][FF0000]Reduces Shield Charge Rate[-][/c]

A main power coupling and regulator that diverts higher charge to a shield generator; increasing shield charge speed at the cost of shield strength.\n[c][00FF00]Increases Shield Charge Rate[-][/c]\n[c][FF0000]Reduces Shield Capacity[-][/c]
Deutsch: Eine Hauptstromkopplung und ein Regler, der höhere Ladung zu einem Schildgenerator umleitet; Erhöhung der Schildladegeschwindigkeit auf Kosten der Schildstärke.
Français: Un couplage et un régulateur d'alimentation principaux qui détournent une charge plus élevée vers un générateur de bouclier ; augmenter la vitesse de charge du bouclier au détriment de la force du bouclier.
Italiano: Un accoppiamento e un regolatore di alimentazione principale che devia una carica maggiore a un generatore di schermatura; aumentando la velocità di carica dello scudo a scapito della forza dello scudo.
Spanish: Un regulador y un acoplamiento de potencia principal que desvía una carga más alta a un generador de escudo; aumentando la velocidad de carga del escudo a costa de la fuerza del escudo.

English: An auxillary power coupling with tremendous throughput that diverts higher charge to a shield generator; increasing shield charge speed at the cost of shield strength.\n[c][00FF00]Increases Shield Charge Rate[-][/c]\n[c][FF0000]Reduces Shield Capacity[-][/c]

The primary energy conduit outfitted with superconductors used for supplying power from a Battleship's generators to the shield capacitors; increasing shield charge speed at the cost of shield strength.\n[c][00FF00]Increases Shield Charge Rate[-][/c]\n[c][FF0000]Reduces Shield Capacity[-][/c]

A reconfigurable Shield Boosting Module capable of either increasing shield capacity [c][00FF00](Shield Capacitor)[-][/c] or shield charge rate [c][66CCFF](Shield Charger)[-][/c] at the cost of its opposing trait.\n[c][00FF00]Press RMB to see all available options[-][/c]

A Biofuel-powered mechanical drill used for mining rocks, terrain and ores faster than the Survival Multitool.\n[c][FFBB00]A dedicated mining vessel is recommended for extensive mining over reliance on hand tools.[-][/c]
A unique application of quantum tunnelling to fold space that allows more internal space than the dimensions of the container would allow.\n\n[c][F300FF]Quantum Technology[-][/c]
An atmospheric field designed to keep oxygen contained in an open and exposed space without the need for walls or door.\n[c][FF0000]Provides NO protection from weaponfire[-][/c]
Ion Thrusters are the standard method of low-power propulsion.\nRadioactive waste from the ship's generators is ionized and propelled through an electromagnetic conductor to produce thrust.

Plasma Thrusters are most commonly used in military and compact vessels over cheaper alternatives.\nInternal plasma converters use the waste from the generator's output in a fissile reaction to produce a ring of magnetically-confined superheated plasma.

Antimatter Thrusters are a revolution in propulsion technology that produce the highest thrust to weight presently possible.\nRadioactive particles from the ship's energy system are converted into antimatter using miniaturized particle accelerators and applied to waste gases in a reaction chamber to produce explosive thrust.

An improvement over the standard Jump Drive that allows the drive greater calculation capabilities without increasing it's size, allowing a smaller craft the ability to initiate interstellar jumps within limitations.
Enhanced conductance coils and better processing speed allows this Advanced Warp Drive the ability to jump further with much greater efficiency than it's standard counterpart.

As the name suggests, the Deconstructor's purpose is to take blocks and devices and disassemble them at 100% efficiency into their components.\nIt is not capable of dismantling components into raw ingots though.

A state-of-the-art miniaturized fusion powerplant that can supply more power than any smaller craft present can draw. Much like its larger counterparts, it's intended for active use and will divert a small portion of its output to sustain a fusion reaction.

Plasma Turbines are used as secondary power generation to recycle the waste plasma from a ship's Generators or Fusion Reactor to produce additional power.
[c][00FFFF]Plasma Turbines do not consume fuel
Each active turbine improves fuel efficiency by reducing a ship's energy consumption[-][/c]
[c][00FF00]Consumption: -200w.[-][/c]

Plasma Turbines are used as secondary power generation to recycle the waste plasma from a ship's Generators or Fusion Reactor to produce additional power.
[c][00FFFF]Plasma Turbines do not consume fuel
Each active turbine improves fuel efficiency by reducing a ship's energy consumption[-][/c]
[c][00FF00]Consumption: -600w.[-][/c]

Plasma Turbines are used as secondary power generation to recycle the waste plasma from a ship's Generators or Fusion Reactor to produce additional power.
[c][00FFFF]Plasma Turbines do not consume fuel
Each active turbine improves fuel efficiency by reducing a ship's energy consumption.[-][/c]
[c][00FF00]Consumption: -1800w.[-][/c]

The Universal Constructor is the pinnacle of hi-tech production, able to produce virtually anything from experimental quantum technology to lifesaving medications. The drawback is that it's slow and energy-intensive, making it a poor substitute for an industrial processing chain.

An auxillary processing unit that expands the functionality of the core's processing limit by a fixed amount, allowing more complex or numerous devices to be added.\n[c][00FF00]Adding more advanced CPU Extenders will provide additional processing power.[-][/c]\n[c][FF0000]Exceeding the CPU Limit will reduce the performance of your weapons, turrets, thrusters, generators and constructors.[-][/c]
A backup processing unit that is presently offline.\n[c][FF0000]Non-Functional\nCan be salvaged for components[-][/c]

A Generator that operates by fusing two or more elements together to release massive amounts of energy.\nRequires a constant energy input to keep the reaction stable, making it suitable for high-output spacecrafts.
A shield generator intended for planetary installations.\nThis shield produces a spherical bubble not suitable for space and takes half damage from CV weapons.

A shield generator based on alien technology.\nGenerates a dome-shaped shield of plasma held in place by an EM field that consumes less pentaxid and power than other shield generators. However the low capacity means that it requires either an extremely large support structure or a battery of Shield Capacitors.

The SGM-70 is an older model of 70mm unguided air-to-ground missile typically fired from a rocket launcher pod affixed to a gunship for engaging ground-based targets.
[c][00FF00]+200% Impact Damage vs Entities
+25% Blast Damage vs Turrets and Weapons[-][/c]
[c][FF0000]+100% Reload Time[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]5,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]

The Hellfire-III/E Missile is a 180mm radar-guided air-to-air missile. An improvement over it's predecessors being equally effective against both ground targets and aircrafts it has remained the main spacecraft-based missile for over a century.
[c][00FF00]+100% Impact Damage vs Entities
+25% Blast Damage vs Thrusters[-][/c]
[c][FF0000]+100% Reload Time[-][/c]

The Lohengrin Positron Blaster Cannon is an experimental energy weapon that strips electrons from whatever matter the beam comes in contact with. Unlike the ship-mounted version, this cannon does not cause radiological atmospheric contamination.\n[c][00FF00]25% Shield Penetration[-][/c]\n[c][FF00FF]40,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]
[c][FF0000]POI Turret intended for planetary POIs ONLY![-][/c]\nThis turret inflicts 200% hull and shield damage to Capital Vessels and Bases in atmosphere to give HV/SV the advantage.

[c][FF0000]Advanced POI Turret intended for planetary POIs ONLY![-][/c]\nAn improvement over the standard turret, this dome-shaped turret has a more confined field of view, but with a superior damage output.\nThis turret inflicts 200% hull and shield damage to Capital Vessels and Bases in atmosphere to give HV/SV the advantage.
A turret designed for operation on both planets and space without any significant loss in performance in either environment.

An Advanced Turret with a naval dome design intended for operation on both planets and space without any significant loss in performance in either environment.\n Has a more confined fields of view, being unable to fire downward, but has a full range of movement vertically where standard models aren't able to aim.
The pink meat of a cold water fish. Used in a number of local and foreign cuisines, it's quite valuable if you can get past the smell.

A thruster reaction chamber module used to convert waste from a ship's generators into ionized gases to be used as propellant for increased thrust.\n\n[c][00FF00]Used to upgrade an Ion Thruster into a Plasma Thruster[-][/c]

A dual ring-type particle accelerator encasing a reaction chamber where particles of radioactive waste from a ship's power system are collided to produce antimatter and channel the subsequent explosion as propulsion.\n\n[c][00FF00]Used to upgrade a Plasma Thruster into an Antimatter Thruster[-][/c]
Packaged furniture designed to be mass-produced for low cost and high strength. Common in both the homes of laborers and colonists as well as the barracks of your local imperial base.
Quality furniture designed with both an eye to detail and form. Comfortable and durable enough for everyday use, but heavy and not up to the rigors and abuses of a frontier settlement.
Standard clothing that is often worn by civilians among the Trade Federation, Zirax Empire, Colonists and even Pirates.
Flexible and strong body armor designed for security personnel and paramilitary groups. It's resistant to a variety of weapons, but lacks the utility of a space suit or a suit constructor.
Strong and comfortable clothing worn by hands-on workers across the galaxy, from farmers to factory workers. It stands up to the rigors of daily life in the industrial sector.
Quality designer clothing of fine material and weave, typically worn by the rich and powerful across the galaxy but not uncommon in a civilian's wardrobe for important occasions.
A luxury among the elite, these articles of jewellery would fetch a suitable price on the market as long as there's someone out there willing to buy such pieces.

[c][FF5555]Restores 150 health.[-][/c]
A hospital-grade Medkit intended to treat traumatic injuries and infections in the field.

[c][00FF00]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]

A specialized hospital-grade Medkit with a 3-part injection process that purges toxins and impurities from the bloodstream and internal organs.\n\n[c][00FF00]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]

A state-of-the-art Medkit used predominantly in industrial applications with a high chance of irradiation. This kit uses formulated nano-particles to purge radiation and dead cells from the bloodstream and soft tissues.\n\n[c][00FF00]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]

[c][FF5555]Restores 250 health.[-][/c]
A common item in any Field Medic's kit, this medicated plasma injector rapidly seals wounds, replenishes red blood cells and accelerates natural healing.

[c][00FF00]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]

[c][FF5555]Restores 400 health.[-][/c]
The latest in medical treatment in the field. This Medkit can do everything a standard Health Pack can do, not just better, but faster too.

[c][00FF00]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]

[c][FF5555]Treats Fractured Bones[-][/c]
A 3D-printed medical cast that will straighten and hold a limb in place while it heals.
[c][00FF00]Fracture's progress bar will turn GREEN when treated, taking only minutes to fully recover.

[c][FFFFFF]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]
A mass-produced automatic rifle made by InterWeap. Reliable and effective in any kind of terrain it's the mainstay of security forces across the galaxy on both sides of the law.
A mass-produced shotgun originally designed for close-quarters defense against pirate boarders. It has since been adopted by both traders and pirates due to it's effectiveness.

A mass-produced blaster rifle from Arriake Technology. Slightly different from a standard laser rifle, the AAF-07 fires plasma gel pellets using a standard laser charge. A slower-moving projectile with a more forceful impact.
A hard shell from some kind of large insect. It likely has some medicinal properties or can be used as a binder in some organic products.
It's a bone. The support structure of vertebrates to which muscle attaches in order to facilitate movement.\nIt has some industrial and medical uses.

A qualified power room technician, capable of fine-tuning energy production and efficiency. Freeing up valuable processing power and improving energy efficiency.\n[c][00FFFF]Power Consumption:[-][/c] [c][FFFFFF]-75W[-][/c]

A qualified engineer trained to modulate shield energy levels better than a basic AI controller. Freeing up valuable processing power and improving shield efficiency.\n[c][FF00FF]Shield Capacity:[-][/c] [c][FFFFFF]+1000[-][/c]\n[c][FF00FF]Shield Charge:[-][/c] [c][FFFFFF]+50[-][/c]

A seasoned fuel system engineer from the Trade Federation. Can handle promethium feed lines and pressure in the fuel delivery system, freeing up diagnostic processing power and improving fuel distribution.\n[c][00FFFF]Fuel Capacity:[-][/c] [c][FFFFFF]+4000L[-][/c]

A trained helmsman with years of experience flying everything from freighters to warships. By taking over the system's inertia control systems manually, he can reduce the processing load on the core while improving handling.\n[c][00FF00]Ship Torque:[-][/c] [c][FFFFFF]+5mN[-][/c]

A qualified communications officer in charge of ship-to-ship communications and logistics. By manually operating the matter transmitters, he can increase the range of the Logistics Connection outside the ship.\n[c][00FFFF]Logistics Range:[-][/c] [c][FFFFFF]125m[-][/c]

An ensign trained in ship operation and tactics that can assist in any technical aspect as part of the bridge crew, from fire control to radar analysis. Improves CPU management across the board, but lacks any specific abilities.\n[c][00FF00]CPU Capacity:[-][/c] [c][FFFFFF]+3750[-][/c]

A security officer with a history of naval service as a weapon specialist. Can order and arrange munitions in a more practical order allowing more ammunition to be crammed into the weapon system without the interference of the onboard logistics system.\n[c][FF6600]Ammunition Capacity:[-][/c] [c][FFFFFF]+4000L[-][/c]

A medical officer from the Trade Federation with years of active service on record. Can treat anything from dermal burns to space herpes... probably.\n[c][FF5555]Cures almost every status effect[-][/c]

A fresh salad composed of Ziraxian red cabbage, Omicronian Daikon, and topped with grilled Ignidon meat.\n[c][B2FF80]Slowly recovers health and increases maximum health. Not very filling though.[-][/c]
Ice cold chocolate chip Ice cream. Eat it before it melts!\n[c][008FFF]Protects against high temperatures\nRecovers stamina and rapidly reduces body temperature[-][/c]

A special cocktail made at only a number of bars and restaurants. It burns going down and has an odd spicy aftertaste.\n[c][FF0000]Protects against cold temperatures\nImproves Health and Stamina regeneration[-][/c]
A special cocktail made at only a number of bars and restaurants. It's smooth with citrus overtones and a grassy smell\n[c][00FFAA]Adds constant regeneration, but is slightly radioactive.[-][/c]
A pink milkshake that appears to be very similar to Strawberry with some hint of other mixed berries.\n[c][FF6666]Increases maximum Stamina and increases movement speed by 75%[-][/c]

A special cocktail made at only a number of bars and restaurants. It has a sharp, sour taste with a smell like gasoline.[c][008FFF]Massively increases maximum Health, but reduces maximum stamina and movement speed[-][/c]
[c][FF0000]Protected against cold temperatures!\nHealth and Stamina recovery improved![-][/c]
What the hell did I just drink?\n[c][00FF80]Gained the regenerative abilities of The Legacy. Also gained their radioactivity...[-][/c]
Strawberry, Yum!\n[c][FF6666]Maximum Stamina and Movement Speed increased![-][/c]
I feel really weird right now...\n[c][008FFF]Maximum Health Increased by 400!\nMaximum Stamina and Speed Reduced by 50%[-][/c]
A System Core module infected with legacy quantum technology that provides superior processing power.
An auto-loading container that utilizes the logistics system to load ammunition automatically into turrets and weapons.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]Required in order to load any weapon on the same structure[-][/c]
Drilling mode for use on planets for the extraction of resources from the ground and surface rocks.
Drilling mode for use in space against asteroids in zero gravity.
Device used for modifying and customizing weapons with damage, recoil, accuracy and reload speed upgrades.
Anti-Collision weapon for Patrol Vessels to be placed on their nose to prevent players from face-hugging or ramming the ship to stop it.\nWill destroy the front of the player's ship on close contact.

An after-market suit attachment that fills the space between suit layers with a non-Newtonian fluid that hardens when struck, providing additional armor from impacts and damage.\n[c][FFBB00]Can only be attached to a suit using an Armor Locker[-][/c]

An after-market suit attachment that applies a nanogel to the lining of the suit, providing better insulation against environmental sources and amplifying nerve connectivity between the suit and it's wearer.\n[c][FFBB00]Can only be attached to a suit using an Armor Locker[-][/c]

An after-market suit attachment that uses a neurokinetic weave to amplify force feedback and dampen inertia during physical movement.\n[c][FFBB00]Can only be attached to a suit using an Armor Locker[-][/c]
An after-market suit attachment comprised of a secondary high-pressure oxygen tank and regulator.\n[c][FFBB00]Can only be attached to a suit using an Armor Locker[-][/c]
An after-market suit attachment that adds an improved plasma injector to the jetpack for more efficient thrust vectoring.\n[c][FFBB00]Can only be attached to a suit using an Armor Locker[-][/c]

An after-market suit attachment that utilizes a thermoconductive nanogel added between layers of the suit that improves resistance to cold and stabilizes suit structure in the vacuum of space.\n[c][FFBB00]Can only be attached to a suit using an Armor Locker[-][/c]

An after-market suit attachment that consists of external thermocouples to shunt excess temperature from the suit into advanced heat sinks, keeping the wearer cool in the most extreme of environments.\n[c][FFBB00]Can only be attached to a suit using an Armor Locker[-][/c]

An after-market suit attachment that infuses the suit's lining with a sathium-based ferrofluid that provides additional protection from gamma radiation without affecting mobility.\n[c][FFBB00]Can only be attached to a suit using an Armor Locker[-][/c]

An after-market suit attachment comprised of reinforced servos and carrying harness to maximize carry capacity. A popular choice in the industrial sector for transporting heavy goods.\n[c][FFBB00]Can only be attached to a suit using an Armor Locker[-][/c]

Unpurified water in a transparent and permiable fluid container. Can be stored, frozen or poured into an appropriate space like an ordinary block.\n[c][00BBFF]The water will not flow beyond it's border and has the full fluid mass of it's dimensions (7250L).[-][/c]\n[c][FFBB00]Cannot be used as a water source for extractors.[-][/c]

A commercial constructor manufactured by Polaris for use by colonists, private industrial outposts, the Trade Federation and even the Zirax Empire.\nThese constructors were standard use across settled space until UCH models became available on the galactic market, that while more CPU-intensive were less energy-intensive.

Manufactured by Polaris for the last 80 years, these Deconstructors were standard among salvagers until less energy-intensive UCH models became available on the galactic market. Which one is better is a hotly debated topic in many forums.

Made from processing grain and fruit into biofuel, Bioethanol can be converted into an emergency fuel source in many plasma generators with greater efficiency than Biodiesel.\nIt's recommended that you clean your generators and fuel tanks after use however.

Storage Bay for Planetary Drones that functions as an Ammunition Controller for Drone Launchpads.

Power on the Drone Bay and Drone Launchpad to launch drones on a planet.
Power off the devices to command the drones to return to the launchpad and return to storage.

Will function in space, but be too slow for practical use.

Storage Bay for Orbital Drones that functions as an Ammunition Controller for Drone Launchpads.

Power on the Drone Bay and Drone Launchpad to launch drones in space.
Power off the devices to command the drones to return to the launchpad and return to storage.

Will function on planets, but the drones have no object avoidance on planets and will crash into the ground.

Combat Drone equipped with a 30mm Autocannon designed for short-ranged operation on planets.\nMust be placed inside a Drone Bay with a functional Drone Launchpad.\nWill return to base when the launchpad is turned off.

High-speed Interceptor Drone equipped with a burst plasma cannon designed for short-ranged operation in space.\nMust be placed inside a Drone Bay with a functional Drone Launchpad.\nWill return to base when the launchpad is turned off.
A drone Launchpad that is required to launch drones stored in a Drone Bay and give them a place to return to when powered off.
A lightweight steel blade with a polymer handle. Although rarely needed in combat, it's a reliable piece of kit in survival situations.\n[c][37D2FF]Consumes stamina to attack[-][/c]
EnTech's model-7 Plasma cutter.\nTypically a more utilitarian design for cutting away debris and wreckage. It became common to customize the frame into an antiquated sword design.
Reinforced heavy doors designed to contain explosions and fire from spreading to other parts of a structure.\n[c][37D2FF]High Blast Resistance[-][/c]
A compact, multi-platform Gravity Generator developed by Polaris. Usable on any platform, they are rapidly replacing standard units despite their significantly higher costs.
A massive satellite dish for long-ranged communication.\nUnfortunately, this technology is outdated and provides no functionality compared to your modern equipment, making it wholly decorative.

An oversized antiquated rocket engine that still operates on chemical propellant.\nThis model of thruster hasn't been used in over a century as smaller Ion thrusters replaced the technology.\nNonetheless, it can be retrofitted to function as a normal thruster if you can ignore the ridiculous thruster size...

A Shuttle Engine once used on both military and commercial spacecrafts that has since been long outdated by modern developments in Ion Thruster technology.\nAlthough impractical, this model has been retrofitted to function as a regular Ion Thruster, albeit a very large one.

[c][FF0000]Debug Multitool for creative mode use ONLY[-][/c]
Indestructible
Unlimited Ammunition
Instant Salvage
Fine-Damage Modes
[c][FF0000]Access Denied[-][/c]\nUse '{0}' to enter a valid access code
[c][FF0000]Foreign Core Detected[-][/c]\nCore must be removed or replaced to proceed.
[c][FF0000]Blueprint Complexity exceeds the limits of the server[-][/c]\nWill negatively affect local and server performance if used.
Cargo Container with dialog function for POI use.
Non-functional automining device that can be placed as a decorative object.\nAccepts dialog options for POI construction.\n[c][FF0000]Avoid overuse due to performance issues[-][/c]
A block group for placing decorative blocks. See tooltips on individual blocks.\n\n[c][A9A9A9][i]Requires Reforged Eden.[/i][-][/c]

A warning light with a built in alarm. Can be controlled via signals.
Damage with a T1 Multitool to change the color of the light between red, orange, and yellow based on how damaged the light is. Note: repairing your ship will reset the light color to red.

[c][A9A9A9][i]Requires Reforged Eden.[/i][-][/c]

A warning light. Can be controlled via signals.
Damage with a T1 Multitool to change the color of the light between red, orange, and yellow based on how damaged the light is. Note: repairing your ship will reset the light color to red.

[c][A9A9A9][i]Requires Reforged Eden.[/i][-][/c]
A panel that can act as a switch to control signals.\n\n[c][A9A9A9][i]Requires Reforged Eden.[/i][-][/c]

Uses a combination of holograms and magnetically suspended nanoparticles to create a three dimensional projection of a variety of visual effects.
Effect style can be changed in the RMB menu while placing and turned on or off in the control panel or via signals.

[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 30 seconds. Turn effect projector off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

Reflects holographic projections off magnetized nanoparticles to give the illusion of a flame.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 30 seconds. Turn effect projector off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

Reflects holographic projections off magnetized nanoparticles to give the illusion of a flame. The visual effect will trail behind your ship while in movement.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 30 seconds. Turn effect projector off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

Uses a thick cloud of light absorbing nanoparticles suspended in a magnetic field to give the illusion of smoke.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 30 seconds. Turn effect projector off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

Uses a thick cloud of light absorbing nanoparticles suspended in a magnetic field to give the illusion of smoke. The visual effect will trail behind your ship while in movement.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 30 seconds. Turn effect projector off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

Uses a thick cloud of light absorbing nanoparticles suspended in a magnetic field to give the illusion of smoke. The visual effect will trail behind your ship while in movement.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 30 seconds. Turn effect projector off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

Uses a thin cloud of light absorbing nanoparticles suspended in a magnetic field to give the illusion of steam.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 30 seconds. Turn effect projector off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

Leaves behind a thin stream of nanoparticles to give the illusion of an engine trail.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 30 seconds. Turn effect projector off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

Creates an ionized channel that conducts electricity through it.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 30 seconds. Turn effect projector off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

Reflects holographic projections off clumps of nanoparticles to give the illusion of fireflies.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 30 seconds. Turn effect projector off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

Arranges nanoparticles into distinct groups and reflects a strong holograpic projection off of them to create a large ring of lights to act as a docking guide for space stations. The ring is several hundred meters in diameter.
Place in the center of your space station.

[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 30 seconds. Turn effect projector off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

Arranges nanoparticles into distinct groups and reflects a strong holograpic projection off of them to create a line of static docking guides outward from the emitter.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 30 seconds. Turn effect projector off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

Arranges nanoparticles into distinct groups and reflects a rotating holograpic projection off of them to project a line of animated docking guides outward from the emitter.
These projections are offset slightly to match up seamlessly when placed next to a static docking guide.

[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 30 seconds. Turn effect projector off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

Arranges nanoparticles into distinct groups and reflects a rotating holograpic projection off of them to project the illusion of a cone of light.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 30 seconds. Turn effect projector off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

A decorative holographic emitter that displays a random corporate advertisement. The emitter periodically cycles through different displays.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 20 seconds. Turn holographic emitter off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

A decorative holographic emitter tied in to the Trade Federation Global Market Tracking System.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 20 seconds. Turn holographic emitter off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

A decorative holographic emitter tuned to the Colonist News Network.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 20 seconds. Turn holographic emitter off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

A decorative holographic emitter that displays random pirate propaganda. The emitter periodically cycles through different displays.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 20 seconds. Turn holographic emitter off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]

A decorative holographic emitter that shows random wanted posters. The emitter periodically cycles through different displays.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]The emitter base automatically hides itself after being on for 20 seconds. Turn holographic emitter off to reveal the emitter base.[-][/c]
A decorative holo poster that cycles through random images.
Repair Charges are used to repair damaged and deformed blocks using a Repair Bay instead of consuming raw resources.\n[c][00FFFF]Can only be used by a Repair Bay[-][/c]
The latest Assault Rifle developed by the UCH using techniques and materials found in the Andromeda galaxy. It exhibits far better performance than older models of assault rifle.
A modern Combat shotgun developed by the UCH using hybridized engineering of both Polaris and the Zirax Empire to improve the older model UC shotgun.

A weapon system wholly unique to The Legacy that uses a programmable antimatter stream to annihilate atomic bonds, even through shields.
[c][00FF00]High damage vs Armor Blocks
50% Shield Penetration[-][/c]
[c][FF0000]Not usable by players[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]60,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]

Developed by the Brotherhood of Farr, the Ion Beam Turret is locally known as "The Golden Law" and is based on Legacy Disruptor technology. While it lacks destructive capabilities, it is highly effective at stripping the electrons from shields.
[c][00FF00]High Shield Damage[-][/c]
[c][FF0000]No Hull Damage
Cannot be retrieved once placed[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]60,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]

An oversized Ion Cell Battery used to power the Brotherhood of Farr's Ion Beam Technology.
[c][00FF00]High Shield Damage
High Mechanoid and Drone Damage[-][/c]
[c][FF0000]No Hull Damage[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]60,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]

Decorative trees for safe and easy transplant around your base which contain a nutrient supply for survival in the harshest of climates.
Will clip through blocks once placed

[c][FF0000]Trees have a hard placement limit for performance[-][/c]

A reinforced combat steel Bulldozer Blade traditionally used for landscaping and demolition, can demolish trees, surface rocks and function as a passable shield to incoming fire.\n[c][00FF00]+50% Blast Resistance[-][/c]\n[c][FF0000]Cannot Damage Structures[-][/c]
Decorative devices with a degree of durability that can be used internally or externally for aesthetics.\n[c][FF0000]Overuse will affect performance[-][/c]
Decorative turbine that can be used as ventilation covers. Can be turned off and on with signal logic.\nDoes not inflict damage if stepped on... yet.\nEmits sound when turned on.
Block Group for POIs that damage, explode or otherwise do nasty things when poked, prodded or inhaled.\n\n[c][FF0000]For POI use ONLY[-][/c]
Laser fences inflict instant death on contact with a player or NPC.\nCannot be turned off.
Toxic Gas inflicts 50 damage per second that a player or NPC is in contact with it.
Combustible Fuel Drum. Will explode if shot, dealing damage to all surrounding enemies.\nCan be detonated via signal.

Effects Volume [c][ffff00](doesn't affect custom sounds! Keep at 100% in RE)[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]An internal error occurred while playing [b]Reforged Eden 2[/b].
Do not report this to the game developers via email.[-][/c]

Please see the [b]Reforged Eden 2 Workshop[/b] for support on the scenario or contact your server admin if playing on a multiplayer server.
Deutsch: Ein interner Fehler ist aufgetreten!\nBitte beschreibe in der vorbereiteten Email kurz was passiert ist - danke!
Français: Une erreur interne s'est produite !\nVeuillez insérer une courte description dans l'email préparé - merci !
Italiano: Si è verificato un errore interno!\nInserisci una breve descrizione all'interno della segnalazione, grazie!
Spanish: ¡Se ha producido un error interno!\nPor favor, escribe una pequeña descripción del mismo en este correo - ¡Gracias!
Portuguese (Euro): Ocorreu um erro interno!\nInsira uma breve descrição no email elaborado. Obrigado!
Portuguese (Brazil): Um erro interno ocorreu!\nPor favor insira uma breve descrição no email preparado - Obrigado!
Polish: Wystąpił błąd!\nWprowadź krótki opis w załączonym e-mailu - dziękujemy!
Russian: Произошла внутренняя ошибка!\nПожалуйста, вставьте описание ошибки в подготовленное письмо - спасибо!
Japanese: 内部エラーが発生しました!\n準備された電子メールに簡単な説明を挿入してください - ありがとう!
Chinese (simplified): 发生了一个内部错误！\n请在给我们的邮件中简短描述该问题 - 多谢！
Chinese (traditional): 發生內部錯誤！\n請在準備好的郵件中加入簡要描述 - 謝謝！
Greek: Παρουσιάστηκε ένα εσωτερικό σφάλμα!\nΠαρακαλώ εισήγαγε ένα σύντομο κείμενο περιγραφής στο προετοιμασμένο email - ευχαριστούμε!
Dutch: Er is een interne fout opgetreden!\n Plaats een korte beschrijving in de voorbereide e-mail - dank u!
Vietnamese: Đã xảy ra lỗi nội bộ!\n Vui lòng chèn một mô tả ngắn vào email đã chuẩn bị - cảm ơn bạn!

English: [c][ffff00]Do not use![-][/c] See Reforged Eden Workshop for support.

Spanish: Partida guardada. Creada copia de seguridad
Portuguese (Euro): Jogo guardado. Foi criada cópia de segurança.
Japanese: ゲームを保存:バックアップ作成
Chinese (traditional): 遊戲已儲存。備份已建立。
Greek: Το παιχνίδι αποθηκεύτηκε. Το Αντίγραφο Ασφαλείας δημιουργήθηκε.
Vietnamese: Trò chơi đã được lưu. Đã tạo bản sao lưu.

If in survival, you may use a multitool to pick up this block to get a correct version.\nThese blocks were marked for removal years ago.

Spanish: NOTA: Cuando abras el contenedor, tu reputación con {0} se reducirá a "Enemigo"\n¿Abrir de todos modos?
Portuguese (Brazil): NOTA: Se você abrir o contêiner, sua reputação com {0} cairá para 'Não amigável'\nAbrir mesmo assim?
Polish: UWAGA: Kiedy otworzysz pojemnik, twoja reputacja z {0} spadnie do „Nieprzyjaznego”. Czy na pewno chcesz go otworzyć?

Greek: ΣΗΜΕΙΩΣΗ: Όταν ανοίξεις τον φοριαμό η φήμη σου με τους {0} θα πέσει στο 'Μη Φιλικός'\nΘες να τον ανοίξεις όπως και να 'χει;
Vietnamese: LƯU Ý: Khi bạn mở thùng chứa, danh tiếng của bạn với {0} sẽ giảm xuống 'Không thân thiện'\n Vẫn mở?

English: Respawn near your death location. This might be dangerous.\nTip: use your player drone (F5) to safely recover your backpack.
Deutsch: In der Nähe deines Sterbeorts spawnen.\n[c][d23b18]WARNUNG: Du kannst in tödlicher Umgebung respawnen.[-][/c]
Français: Réapparaître près du lieu où vous êtes mort. \n[d23b18]ATTENTION: Vous pourriez réapparaître à nouveau dans un environnement mortel.[-]
Italiano: Rinasci vicino al luogo in cui sei morto.\n[c][d23b18]ATTENZIONE: Luogo potenzialmente pericoloso.[-][/c]
Spanish: Reaparecer cerca del lugar de tu muerte.\n[c][d23b18]ADVERTENCIA: Puede que vuelvas a reaparecer en un entorno mortal.[-][/c]
Portuguese (Euro): Reproduzir perto do local do óbito.\n[c][d23b18]AVISO: Pode reproduzir novamente em ambiente mortífero.[-][/c]
Portuguese (Brazil): Renascer próximo ao local da sua morte.\n[c][d23b18]ATENÇÃO: Você poderá renascer em um local perigoso novamente.[-][/c]
Polish: Odrodzenie się w pobliżu miejsca śmierci.\n[c][d23b18]OSTRZEŻENIE: Możesz znaleźć się w śmiertelnie niebezpiecznym otoczeniu[-][/c]
Russian: Возродиться рядом с местом вашей смерти.\n[c][d23b18]ПРЕДУПРЕЖДЕНИЕ: Вы можете снова появиться в опасной зоне.[-][/c]
Japanese: 死亡したキャラクター付近で復活します \n[c][d23b18]WARNING:致命的な環境で再び生き返るかもしれない[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 在你死亡的位置附近重生。\n[c][d23b18]警告:你可能再一次在处于危险环境中，很大可能被守尸。[-][/c]
Chinese (traditional): 在死亡地點附近重生。\n[c][d23b18]警告：你可能會再度置身於危險環境中。[-][/c]
Korean: 사망 위치 근처에서 부활하십시오.\n[c][d23b18]경고: 치명적인 환경에서 부활할 수 있습니다.[-][/c]
Greek: Δημιουργία κοντά στην τοποθεσία θανάτου.\n[c][d23b18]ΠΡΟΕΙΔΟΠΟΙΗΣΗ: Μπορεί να επαναδημιουργηθείς σε θανατηφόρο περιβάλλον.[-][/c]
Dutch: Respawn dichtbij je sterflocatie. \ N [c] [d23b18] WAARSCHUWING: je kunt opnieuw opnieuw spawnen in een dodelijke omgeving. [-] [/ c]
Vietnamese: Hồi sinh gần vị trí bạn đã chết.\n[c][d23b18]CẢNH BÁO: Có thể bạn sẽ chết một lần nữa nếu hồi sinh ở đây.[-][/c]

English: Respawn at your closest Survival Tent.
Français: Réapparaître près de votre tente de survie
Italiano: Rigenerati nella tua tenda di sopravvivenza più vicina
Spanish: Reaparece en tu tienda de supervivencia más cercana
Portuguese (Brazil): Reaparecer na sua barraca de sobrevivência mais próxima
Polish: Odródź się w swoim najbliższym namiocie

Chinese (traditional): 在離你最近的求生帳篷處重生
Greek: Επαναδημιουργία στην πιο κοντική Σκηνή Επιβίωσης
Vietnamese: Tái tạo tại Lều Sinh tồn gần nhất của bạn

Français: Station médicale / Chambre de clonage la plus proche
Italiano: Stazione Medica/Camera di Clonazione più vicina
Spanish: Estación Médica/Cámara de Clonación más cercana
Portuguese (Brazil): Próximo á uma Estação Médica/Câmara de Clonagem
Polish: Najbliższa Stacja Medyka albo Komora Klonowania
Japanese: 最寄りのメディカルステーション/クローンチャンバー
Vietnamese: Trạm cứu thương gần nhất / Phòng hồi sinh

Deutsch: Auf deiner Heimatbasis auf {0} spawnen.\n[c][1eab11]Dies ist eine sichere respawn Option.[-][/c]
Français: Réapparaître dans votre bâtiment principal sur {0} - [1eab11](Option sûre)[-]

English: You will respawn back at your original spawn location on {0}.\nDoes not restart your game and you keep all progress but lose all the items and armor carried on you.
Deutsch: Du wirst das Spiel neu auf {0}beginnen.

Portuguese (Brazil): Você vai recomeçar o jogo em {0}.
Chinese (simplified): 你将会在{0}重新开始游戏。

Dutch: Je start het spel opnieuw op {0}.
Vietnamese: Bạn sẽ khởi động lại trò chơi trên {0}.

English: You will respawn back at your original spawn location on {0}.\nDoes not restart your game and you keep all progress but lose all items and armor carried on you.
Deutsch: Du wirst das Spiel neu auf {0} in deiner Rettungskapsel beginnen.
Français: Vous allez redémarrer le jeu sur {0} dans votre module de survie.

Portuguese (Euro): Irá recomeçar o jogo em {0} na sua cápsula de saída.
Portuguese (Brazil): Você vai recomeçar o jogo em {0} na Cápsula de Fuga.
Polish: Rozpoczniesz ponownie grę na {0}, w kapsule ratunkowej.
Russian: Вы перезапустите игру на {0} в вашей спасательной капсуле.
Chinese (simplified): 你将会在{0}的逃生舱内重新开始游戏。
Chinese (traditional): 您將在逃生艙裡於{0}重新開始遊戲。
Greek: Θα ξεκινήσεις ξανά το παιχνίδι στον {0} στο σκάφος διαφυγής.
Dutch: Je start de game opnieuw op, op {0} in je ontsnappingscapsule
Vietnamese: Bạn sẽ khởi động lại trò chơi trên {0} trong nhóm thoát của mình.

English: You will respawn back at your original spawn location on {0}.\nDoes not restart your game and you keep all progress but lose all items and armor carried on you.

Vietnamese: Bạn sẽ khởi động lại trò chơi trên {0} tại {1}.

English: [c][FFA500]Plant is not growing because radiation is too high[-][/c]\nMake sure there are no radiation emitting devices nearby and room is airtight.
Deutsch: Pflanze kann nicht wachsen da Strahlung zu hoch ist
Français: Les plantes ne peuvent pas pousser car les radiations sont trop élevées
Italiano: La pianta non sta crescendo perchè le radiazioni sono troppo alte
Spanish: La planta no está creciendo porque la radiación es demasiado alta
Portuguese (Brazil): A vegetação não esta crescendo devido os altos níveis de radiação
Polish: Roślina nie może urosnąć ze względu na zbyt wysokie promieniowanie
Russian: Растению мешает расти слишком высокий уровень радиации
Japanese: 放射線が高すぎて植物が成長しない
Chinese (simplified): 植物没有生长，因为辐射太高
Chinese (traditional): 植物沒有生長，因為輻射太高
Greek: Το φυτό δεν μεγαλώνει επειδή η ραδιενέργεια είναι πολύ υψηλή
Vietnamese: Cây không phát triển vì bức xạ quá cao

English: [c][FFA500]Plant is not growing because the temperature is too high or too low[-][/c]\nMake sure room is airtight.
Deutsch: Pflanze kann nicht wachsen weil die Temperatur zu hoch oder zu niedrig ist
Français: Les plantes ne peuvent pas pouser car la température est trop élevée ou trop basse
Italiano: La pianta non sta crescendo perchè la temperatura è troppo alta o troppo bassa
Spanish: La planta no está creciendo porque la temperatura es muy alta o muy baja
Portuguese (Brazil): A vegetação não esta crescendo devido temperaturas muito altas ou muito baixas
Polish: Roślina nie może urosnąć ze względu na zbyt ekstremalną temperaturę
Russian: Растению мешает расти высокий или низкий уровень температуры
Japanese: 温度が高すぎたり低すぎたりして, 植物が成長していない
Chinese (simplified): 植物没有生长，因为温度太高或太低
Chinese (traditional): 植物沒有生長，因為溫度太高或太低
Greek: Το φυτό δεν μεγαλώνει επειδή η θερμοκρασία είναι πολύ υψηλή
Vietnamese: Cây không phát triển vì nhiệt độ quá cao hoặc quá thấp

English: [c][FFA500]Plant is not growing because there is not enough light[-][/c]\nPlace a grow light above.
Deutsch: Pflanze kann nicht wachsen da sie nicht genügend Licht bekommt
Français: Les plantes ne peuvent pas pousser car il n'y a pas assez de lumière
Italiano: La pianta non sta crescendo perchè non c'è abbastanza luce
Spanish: La planta no está creciendo porque no hay suficiente luz
Portuguese (Brazil): A vegetação não esta crescendo pois não há iluminação suficiente
Polish: Roślina nie może urosnąć ze względu na zbyt niskie nasłonecznienie
Japanese: 十分な光がないので, 植物は成長していない
Chinese (traditional): 植物沒有生長，因為光線不夠
Greek: Το φυτό δεν μεγαλώνει γιατί δεν υπάρχει αρκετό φως
Vietnamese: Cây không phát triển vì không có đủ ánh sáng

English: [c][FFA500]Plant is not growing because there is no oxygen[-][/c]\nMake sure room is airtight and supply oxygen via ventilators.
Deutsch: Pflanze kann auf Grund von fehlender Atmosphäre nicht wachsen
Français: Les plantes ne peuvent pas pousser car il n'y a pas d'oxygène
Italiano: La pianta non sta crescendo perchè non c'è ossigeno
Spanish: La planta no está creciendo porque no hay oxígeno
Portuguese (Brazil): A vegetação não esta crescendo pois não há oxygênio suficiente
Polish: Roślina nie może urosnąć ze względu na zbyt niski poziom tlenu
Japanese: 酸素がないので, 植物は成長していない
Chinese (simplified): 植物没有生长，因为没有氧气
Chinese (traditional): 植物沒有生長，因為沒有氧氣
Greek: Το φυτό δεν μεγαλώνει γιατί δεν υπάρχει οξυγόνο
Vietnamese: Cây không phát triển vì không có oxy

English: You cannot damage the target with this weapon!\nWeapon is not powerful enough or structure is protected by an [c][00ffff]admin core[-][/c].
Deutsch: Mit dieser Waffe kannst du dein Ziel nicht beschädigen!\nSchalte per RMT in einen anderen Modus oder wähle eine andere Waffe.
Français: Cette arme n'a aucune incidence sur la cible! \nPassez sur un autre mode d'arme avec «clic Droit» ou utilisez une autre arme.
Italiano: Non puoi danneggiare il bersaglio con questa arma!\nCambia modalità di fuoco o arma.
Spanish: ¡No puedes dañar al objetivo con esta arma!\nCambia a un modo de arma diferente con BDR o usa otra arma.
Portuguese (Brazil): Você não pode danificar o alvo com esta arma!\nMude para um modo de arma diferente clicando em BtnDir ou use outra arma.
Polish: Nie możesz uszkodzić celu za pomocą tej broni! Przełącz tryb strzelania za pomocą PPM lub użyj innej broni.
Russian: Вы не можете повредить цель этим оружием!\nПереключите режим стрельбы при помощи ПКМ или используйте другое оружие.
Japanese: この武器でターゲットにダメージを与えることはできません!\nRMBをクリックして別の武器モードに切り替えるか, 別の武器を使用してください.
Chinese (simplified): 此武器无效！\n使用其他武器，或者单击鼠标右键切换到不同的武器模式。
Chinese (traditional): 此武器無效！ \n使用其他武器，或者單擊鼠標右鍵切換到不同的武器模式。
Greek: Δεν μπορείς να κάνεις ζημιά σε αυτόν τον στόχο με αυτό το όπλο!\nΆλλαξε το όπλο σε μία διαφορετική λειτουργία πατώντας Δεξί Κλικ ή χρησιμοποίησε ένα άλλο όπλο.
Vietnamese: Bạn không thể gây sát thương mục tiêu bằng vũ khí này!\n Chuyển sang chế độ vũ khí khác bằng cách nhấp vào RMB hoặc sử dụng vũ khí khác.

English: You are playing the [c][00ffff]Reforged Eden 2[-][/c] scenario. Please see the Reforged Eden workshop or contact your server admin for support!
Deutsch: Bitte beachten: Der Überlebenskonstruktor kann nur Gegenstände aus dem INVENTAR verwenden (nicht aber aus dem Schnellzugriff)
Français: A noter que le Constructeur de survie utilise seulement les éléments de l'INVENTAIRE (pas de la barre outils).
Italiano: Attenzione: Il Costruttore di Sopravvivenza può utilizzare solo gli oggetti dell'Inventario (non funziona con la Barra degli Strumenti)
Spanish: Nota: El Constructor de Supervivencia sólo puede utilizar objetos del INVENTARIO (pero no de la Barra de Herramientas)
Portuguese (Brazil): Por favor note: O Construtor de Sobrevivência só pode usar itens do INVENTÁRIO (mas não da Barra de Ferramentas)
Polish: Informacja: Podręczny konstruktor może korzystać tylko z przedmiotów w INWENTARZU (ale nie z paska narzędzi)
Russian: Будьте внимательны: Встроенный конструктор может использовать предметы только из инвентаря (панель инструментов для него не доступна)
Japanese: 注意:サバイバルコンストラクタはインベントリーのアイテムのみを使用できます(ツールバーからは使用できません)
Chinese (simplified): 请注意:生存建造机只能使用背包中的物品 (不能使用快捷栏的物品)
Chinese (traditional): 請注意:生存建造機只能使用背包中的物品 (不能使用快捷欄的物品)
Greek: Σημείωσε ότι: Ο Κατασκευαστής Επιβίωσης μπορεί μόνο να χρησιμοποιηθεί από το INVENTORY σου (αλλά όχι από την Γραμμή Εργαλειών)
Dutch: Notitie: De overlevings constructeur kan enkel items uit de inventaris gebruiken (en niet uit de Toolbar)
Vietnamese: Xin lưu ý: Chế tạo sinh tồn chỉ có thể sử dụng các mục từ túi đồ chứ không phải từ Thanh công cụ)

Japanese: ストレージがありません
