English:
[c][00ffff]>>>Read the PDA First[-][/c] [sup][c][ffff00](F1)[-][/c][/sup][c][00ffff]<<<[-][/c][sup]

[c][00ffff]Missions:[-][/c] Missions are managed under the Solo Missions tab. Start completing the Reforged Galaxy or Project Eden story missions to unlock additional missions.
[c][00ffff]Empyriopedia:[-][/c] Contains a comprehensive encyclopedia of the scenario and can answer many of your questions. Additional entries are unlocked as you progress through the scenario.
[c][00ffff]Journey Book:[-][/c] Shows a log of previous mission dialog.

[c][00ffff]Tooltips:[-][/c] Tooltips provide important information on many items and devices. Mouse over any item in your inventory, constructor, or tech tree to view details.

[c][00ffff]Planets and Sectors:[-][/c] Planets and sectors in the current solar system are scanned and a basic description of each can be viewed on the local or solar system map.

[c][00ffff]Galaxy:[-][/c] Project Eden contains a large galaxy viewable on the galaxy map. Star class and faction territory change what you may find in a star system.

[c][00ffff]Mass, Volume and CPU:[-][/c] The mass, volume, and CPU restrictions are enabled by default. Use the logistics system to move items too large to fit in the player inventory.

[c][00ffff]Escaping your starting system:[-][/c] Resources to build a basic small vessel can be found on your starting planet.
Resources for a warp capable small vessel can be found on the moon of your starting planet.
Resources for a warp capable capital vessel are on other planets in your starting solar system.
Advanced resources are found in other star systems.[/sup]
The Drone Swarm is a deadly menace.
The Drone Swarm is a deadly menace.

A geothermal generator usable on planets with high geological activity. Reduces the power usage of your base while active.\nInteract with the geothermal generator after placement to begin the activation process. Requires unlocking Active Geothermal Generator in the tech tree.\n[c][FFFFFF]This is the closest we can add to real geothermal power in a scenario.[-][/c]

Active geothermal generators reduce the power usage of your base.\nRequires activating a geothermal generator using a geological core sample.\nBase will still require a standard generator and fuel tank to run.

For the large scale extraction of resources from water.
[c][00ffff]Requires a specific activation process.[-][/c][sup]

[c][00FFFF][b]Requirements:[/b][-][/c]
[sup][c][FFFFFF]-Must be placed on a base within logistics range of the [b]Lake[/b] (internal name Water) biome.
-Interact with the extractor to begin the activation process.
-Requires 1 Small Optronic Matrix to activate.
Multiple extractors can be linked together in a network.[-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF]Requires schematic purchased from Free Colonists or found as loot. Requires level 15 to craft and level 20 to activate.[-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF]This is the closest we can add to a real T2 water extractor in a scenario.[-][/c]
For the large scale extraction of resources from water. This extractor is acting as the primary extractor. Additional extractors may be networked together.

A block for POIs. Can be salvaged or deconstructed for components.

[FFFF00]This block cannot be used by players. Installation onto a player base or ship may overload the CPU systems and cause damage.[-][/c]
[c][A9A9A9][i]Requires Project Eden or Reforged Eden.[/i][-][/c]

[c][A9A9A9]This item is from Reforged Eden and has no use in Project Eden. It is included for compatibility reasons.\nPlease do not report.\nThis item will automatically decay on its own or it may be trashed.[-][/c]
A data pad containing information on the Andromeda galaxy.\n\nTurn in at the Research Computer on board UCH Research Vessels to obtain additional unlock points.

[c][ffffff]Upgrades:[-][/c] Capital Vessel Warp Drive
[c][ffffff]Base Range Increase:[-][/c] 1 Light Year
[c][ffffff]Max Upgrades:[-][/c] 50[c]

A data pad containing navigational data on the Andromeda galaxy. Allows you to plot safer and more efficient warp jumps.
Increases the maximum range you can warp while piloting any ship.

Turn in to Research Computers on UCH Research Vessels to increase the base range you can plot a warp jump.
This item is not currently used but may have a use in a future update. Hold on to it!

This license allows use of the furnaces on board [c][FFA500]Polaris orbital refineries.[/c][-] 

[c][FFFFFF][i]Place ores in the furnace input cargo container in the upper hangar. 
Pick up refined ingots from the bottom hangar.[/i]

A block group for placing Project Eden POI blocks in creative mode. RMB to change type. Not allowed in blueprints.

[c][FFFF00]THESE BLOCKS ARE ONLY FOR INTERNAL USE IN CREATIVE MODE BY THE SCENARIO DEVELOPER AND ARE NOT INTENDED FOR USE IN SURVIVAL.[-][/c]
[c][A9A9A9][i]Requires Project Eden or Reforged Eden.[/i][-][/c]
Generic drones used in alien drone bays. Has no known use.
An invulnerable core for POIs. The structure will remain vulnerable to damage but the core itself cannot be removed in survival.
A totally real core. Not fake at all. Won't explode in your face.
A low powered generator for use on alien POIs. Not targeted by turrets.
An invisible fuel tank for POIs.
An invisible target for NPC weapons or drills. Counts as a warp drive for targeting.

A block group for placing Project Eden 2 dummy POI blocks in creative mode for upcoming RE2 compatibility. RMB to change type. Not allowed in blueprints.

[c][FFFF00]THESE BLOCKS ARE ONLY FOR INTERNAL USE IN CREATIVE MODE BY THE SCENARIO DEVELOPER AND ARE NOT INTENDED FOR USE IN SURVIVAL.[-][/c]
[c][A9A9A9][i]Requires Project Eden or Reforged Eden.[/i][-][/c]

A block group for placing various lifts. RMB to expand block selection group.
Lifts can be controlled via signals. Two switches or buttons tied to an XOR signal works well.
Lifts can only be directly interacted with via the corner frames on the very top and the platform does not block projectiles.
Not airtight. See individual tooltips for details.

[c][FFFF00]Experimental, may have issues, please leave feedback.[-][/c]
[c][A9A9A9][i]Requires Project Eden or Reforged Eden.[/i][-][/c]
A small lift for interior use. Other blocks can be placed within the lower parts of the lift bounding box.

A small lift without a frame for interior use. Other blocks can be placed within the lower parts of the lift bounding box. To interact with the lift you must use the keypad on the very top of the lift.
A large lift that uses micro tractor beams to raise and lower the platform. Requires adding shutter doors or forcefields to maintain airtightness.

[sup]Fires a stream of armor piercing rounds for heavy kinetic damage. For when you really, really need something to die.[/sup]
[c][FFFFFF]Unlocked via schematic.
[c][00FF00]+25% Impact Damage vs Armor Blocks[-][/c]
[c][FF0000]Reduced accuracy[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]5,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]

An invisible block for controlling decals. Has 1 hp so easily destroyed with explosions. Invisible model so it can be placed near a core or fuel tanks. When destroyed or removed it will disable the decals it controls as set in the control panel.
A dummy control block for use in unarmed orbital patrol vessels that enables them to receive patrol orders. Acts as a turret. This device should remain OFF at all times. POI use only.

[sup]Fires a stream of shield penetrating armor piercing rounds for heavy kinetic damage.[/sup]
[c][FFBB00]Can only be used in Space[-][/c]
[c][00FF00]+25% Impact Damage vs Armor Blocks[-][/c]
[c][FF0000]+25% CPU requirement[-][/c]
[c][FF0000]Reduced accuracy[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]10% Shield Penetration[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]11,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]
A block to decrease the shield capacity or recharge rate of Project Eden POIs. Gives back a Combat Steel block when salvaged.
A block to increase the shield capacity or recharge rate of Project Eden POIs. Gives back a Combat Steel block when salvaged.
A weak, compact shield generator for POIs.
A compact shield generator built out of salvaged parts or secondhand components. Most often used on bandit or colonist ships.

A weak, compact shield generator for Drone Swarm ships and bases. Produces a strong shield matrix but has a poor natural recharge rate and cooldown time. Use shield upgrades to customize the shield stats.
A weak shield generator for POIs or patrol vessels.
A shield generator for Drone Swarm ships and bases. Produces a strong shield matrix but has a poor natural recharge rate and cooldown time. Use shield upgrades to customize the shield stats.
A plasma shield emitter for planetary POIs. Provides constant recharge even while under fire but has a heavy cooldown timer after losing shields. Use shield upgrades to customize the shield stats.

[sup]A long range turret that fires a fast moving projectile.
[c][00FF00]Alternate fire modes available via right click.[-][/c]
[c][FFBB00]Can only be used in Space[-][/c]
[c][00FF00]+25% Impact Damage vs Armor Blocks
[c][00FF00]5% Shield Penetration[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]11,000 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c][/sup]
Ammunition for the Medium Railgun Turret, Heavy Railgun Turret, and LX-2 Thor Experimental Railgun.

[sup]A long range turret that fires a fast moving projectile for high damage especially to armor.Uses a high amount of power while active.
[c][FFFFFF]Unlocked via schematic.[-][/c]
[-][/c]
[c][FFBB00]Can only be used in Space[-][/c]
[c][00FF00]+25% Impact Damage vs Armor Blocks
[c][00FF00]5% Shield Penetration[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]16,500 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c][/sup]

[c][FFBB00]Can only be used in Space[-][/c]
[c][00FF00]+100% Damage vs HV/SV
+300% Damage vs drones[-][/c]
[c][FF00FF]1,200 Shield Damage per minute[-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF]Unlocked via schematic.[-][/c]
Ammunition for the Sentinel Flak Turret.

A reinforced cargo container for POIs and NPC ships.

Very high HP to survive most battles. Set loot via container ID in the control panel.
[c][A9A9A9][i]Requires Project Eden or Reforged Eden.[/i][-][/c]

Wreckage that can be salvaged or deconstructed for raw materials or sold to Free Colonists Scrapyards.

Sometimes leaves behind a box with valuable materials when removed from wrecks.

Most often found in orbital wreckage.
A defunct turret removed from an alien structure. It's made of valuable components that i'm sure I can use on something else.\n[c][FF0000]Decorative Turret Block[-][/c]
Waste from mining processes. Useful resources can be extracted in a deconstructor.
A decorative block for POIs. Cannot be removed via multi-tool.
A decorative block for POIs. Cannot be removed via multi-tool.
A decorative block for POIs. Dialog enabled. \n[c][A9A9A9][i]Requires Project Eden or Reforged Eden.[/i][-][/c]

A heavy plasma cannon carried by the most elite royal guards of the Zirax Empire. The weapon has a magnetic guidance system that allows the plasma projectiles to home in on the target.\nFinding ammunition for this weapon may be quite difficult.\nCannot use weapon attachments.
Ammunition for the Royal Plasma Cannon. One cartridge refills the entire clip.

A supporting structure required for wind turbines. Must be placed outdoors and elevated off the ground by at least 1 supporting block. Place a Wind Turbine directly on top.\n\n[c][FFFFFF]Wind Turbines take up a 5x5 space.[-][/c]

A wind turbine that reduces power consumption by [c][00FF00]300W[-][/c] [c][abd1ff]once activated.
If below requirements are met the turbine will spin up over 60 seconds and then become[-][/c] [c][00FF00]permanently active.[-][/c]

[c][00FFFF][b]Requirements:[/b][-][/c]
[sup][c][FFFFFF]-Outdoors with no obstructions above.
-Placed on top of a wind turbine base.
-Temperature 15C to 35C (60F to 95F).
-Radiation less than 0.4 rad.
-Breathable atmosphere.
-If it gives a 'not enough light warning' raise the turbine base higher off the ground.[-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF]The requirements are hard coded and
cannot be changed by the Reforged Eden 2 developers.[-][/c][/sup]

A wind turbine designed for passive power generation on planets. Must be placed directly on top of a Wind Turbine Base.
It will spin up over 1 minute then if conditions are favorable it will provide a passive reduction in power consumption to your structure until it is removed.
Requires another source of power before it can activate.
Can not activate in extreme heat, cold, radiation, or where there is not a breathable atmosphere.
This wind turbine is reducing the power consumption of your structure. It will continue to operate until it is removed.

A significant upgrade to wind turbines that reduces power consumption by [c][00FF00]600W.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Cannot be crafted in a constructor. Only 15 advanced wind turbines can be upgraded per base. Upgrade existing active turbines with a multitool.
Cannot upgrade idle wind turbines.[-][/c]
[c][FFFF00]Advanced Wind Turbines should be downgraded with a multitool before removing to prevent loss of components.[-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF]Unlocked via schematic.[-][/c]

A shipment of water from a Polaris Orbital Water Harvester around a gas giant. Sell to Colonists Orbital Hydroponics Farms and Orbital Fuel Refineries in Prosperity or Trade Federation Orbital Food Factories and Orbital Hotels in Tranquility. Use logistics toolbar to trade.
A shipment of military equipment. Sell to faction bounty offices in faction territory. Use logistics toolbar to trade.
A self contained transport pod with all the basic essentials and supplies to keep a small crew of workers alive in your cargo hold. Sell to various orbital factories. Use logistics toolbar to trade.
A spacious transport pod with all the basic essentials and supplies to keep a small crew of officers alive in your cargo hold. Sell to various orbital factories. Use logistics toolbar to trade.
An assortment of advanced polymer pellets often used in the manufacturing of plastics and other materials.
A self contained transport pod with a full suite of luxury amenities for transporting the most important VIPs. Sell to various orbital factories. Use logistics toolbar to trade.

A sealed crate that may contain stolen supplies, military equipment, or other items.
Open using a science station on board your ship or base. The cache must be in your personal inventory.

[c][FFFF00]Connect to a cargo container with plenty of free space via logistics before opening caches.[-][/c]

A sealed crate that contains rewards equal to an equivalent alien loot container found in POIs.
Open using a science station on board your ship or base. The cache must be in your personal inventory.

[c][FFFF00]Connect to a cargo container with plenty of free space via logistics before opening caches.[-][/c]
A small focusing lens for manufacturing advanced lasers.
A large focusing lens for manufacturing advanced lasers.
A diamond that has been perfectly cut in an advanced constructor. The process is time intensive.
A device used for regulating the flow of energy.
A survey probe containing basic scanning equipment and radio transmitters.\nUsed only for missions or can be sold to UCH Research Vessels.\nOne use only.
A survey probe containing scientific instruments and long range radio transmitters.\nUsed only for missions or can be sold to UCH Research Vessels.\nOne use only.
A survey probe containing advanced sensors and subspace transmitters.\nUsed only for missions or can be sold to UCH Research Vessels.\nOne use only.
A survey probe containing highly sophisticated scientific instruments and long range subspace antenna.\nUsed only for missions or can be sold to UCH Research Vessels.\nOne use only.

A kit containing everything needed for a damaged ship to repair vital systems. 
One use only.

Turn in to captains of damaged vessels or sell to traders.

A survey report on various spacial anomalies, wrecks, or other objects of interest. UCH Research Vessels may be interested in this.
A survey report of asteroids, gasses, and interstellar dust. Mining Foremen on deep space mining vessels may be interested in this.
A survey report of wrecks, weapon signatures, and subspace communications. Bounty hunter offices may be interested in this.

Used to activate a geothermal generator on a planet with high geological activity.\nPlace in a connected container and use the upgrade function of a multitool on a geothermal generator to activate it.\nThe core sample is too heavy to lift via ship and will quickly cool into a pile of unusable stone.
Salvaged part from an alien Drone used in the construction of computational devices.
A very rare AI core from an alien Drone used in the construction of advanced devices.

Time reduction: [c][FFFFFF]30 minutes[-][/c] 

Uses 3D printing to help manufacture base components. 

When inserted into the blueprint factory it reduces build time of the current blueprint. 

Can only be added to blueprints that are still missing components.

Time reduction: [c][FFFFFF]2 hours[-][/c] 

Uses advanced technology to 3D print blocks or devices using a stream of nanites. 

When inserted into the blueprint factory it reduces build time of the current blueprint. 

Can only be added to blueprints that are still missing components.

A medical injector that injects nanites directly into the bloodstream to stimulate regeneration. \n\nGrants slow health regeneration for 15 minutes.
A medical injector that injects nanites directly into the bloodstream to stimulate regeneration. \n\nGrants fast health regeneration for 2 minutes.

A medical injector that injects nanites directly into the bloodstream to stimulate stamina recovery. 

Grants slow stamina regeneration for 15 minutes.
[c][FFFFFF]Unlocked via schematic.[-][/c]

A medical injector that injects nanites directly into the bloodstream to stimulate stamina recovery. 

Grants fast stamina regeneration for 2 minutes.
[c][FFFFFF]Unlocked via schematic.[-][/c]
Injects radiation cleaning nanites into the bloodstream slowly lowering body radiation. \n\nGrants slow radiation reduction for 15 minutes. Does not prevent or cure any radation illness.
When consumed encases the user in a nearly impenetrable forcefield protecting from virtually all damage for 30 seconds. \n\nSufficently powerful attacks can still kill the user.

A potent beverage that grants increased stamina regeneration at the cost of health for 5 minutes. Use with caution.
[c][FFFFFF]Schematic required to unlock.[-][/c] 

[i][c][A9A9A9]Another fine brew developed by Appleseed Corporation.[-][/c][/i]

A potent beverage that grants increased stamina and health regeneration at the cost of increased body temperature and radiation for 5 minutes. Use with caution.
[c][FFFFFF]Schematic required to unlock.[-][/c] 

[i][c][A9A9A9]Another fine brew developed by Appleseed Corporation.[-][/c][/i]

A potent beverage that reduces body radiation and temperature at the cost of health and hunger for 5 minutes. Use with caution.
[c][FFFFFF]Schematic required to unlock.[-][/c] 

[i][c][A9A9A9]Another fine brew developed by Appleseed Corporation.[-][/c][/i]

A potent beverage that grants increased health regeneration at the cost of stamina and movement speed for 5 minutes. Use with caution.
[c][FFFFFF]Schematic required to unlock.[-][/c] 

[i][c][A9A9A9]Another fine brew developed by Appleseed Corporation.[-][/c][/i]

An emergency life support and medical consumable of alien origin. \n\nFully refills all suit stats and stabilizes radiation. Cures most ailments. Single use only.
A portable oxygen tank used for refilling suit oxygen. \nNot compatible with refilling ship or base O2 tanks.

[c][FF5555]Restores 100 health immediately and another 100 health over 10 seconds.[-][/c]
An upgrade to the standard bandage that binds wounds and rapidly accelerates healing.

[c][00FF00]Use from the toolbar with LMB or from Inventory with Shift+RMB[-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF]Unlocked via schematic.[-][/c]

A plasma rifle of Abyssal design. 

Rapidly fires superheated plasma orbs bound within a magnetic field.
Shares weapon attachments with the Plasma Cannon.
A laser rifle of Abyssal design.\nShares weapon attachments with the Laser Rifle.

Fires a short range jet of super cold exotic plasma. 

Applies cryoshock to enemy players slowing their movement speed and lowering their body temperature.
Cannot use weapon attachments.

A plasma cell of Abyssal design used in Entropic Weapons. 
Refills entire magazine. 

Can be broken down into Promethium Pellets in a deconstructor.

A minigun that fires a burst of incendiary grenades for large area of effect damage to soft targets. 

Wears out quickly.
[c][FFFFFF]Unlocked via schematic.[-][/c]
Cannot use weapon attachments.

A semi-automatic shotgun that uses magnetized coils to rapidly accelerate projectiles allowing for a greater effective range compared to other shotguns at the expense of damage and ammo capacity.\nShares weapon attachments with the Combat Shotgun.

A double barrel shotgun capable of quickly firing off two rounds at point blank range. Effective at very close range only.
The adrenaline from using this weapon restores 25 stamina per shot.
Shares weapon attachments with the Combat Shotgun.

[i][c][A9A9A9]Rip and tear...[-][/c][/i]
A scoped scout rifle designed for medium to long range engagements.\nShares weapon attachments with the Advanced Assault Rifle.
A small SMG useful at very short range. Left mouse for more accurate shots. Hold down left and right mouse for maximum fire speed.\nShares weapon attachments with the MP30 Advanced SMG

An experimental light railgun rifle capable of inflicting massive damage to soft targets or light damage to structures. 

Has an enhanced targeting system allowing for night vision while helmet is equipped. Toggle with suit light hot key. 

1500 damage per shot before resistance modifiers.
Cannot use weapon attachments.
An experimental ion blaster that fires ionized bolts that deal increased damage to shields, devices, and mechanical entities.\nShares weapon attachments with the Laser Rifle.

An experimental lightning gun designed by X-Corp. Deals heavy damage in close range. Deals bonus damage to mechanical entities.

Use right click to overload the rifle, creating a deadly short range blast.
Cannot use weapon attachments.
An experimental plasma rifle designed by X-Corp.\n[c][ffff00]A flaw in the design does not allow this weapon to be reloaded.[-][/c]\nCannot use weapon attachments.
A plasma cartridge for the X-Corp PR-65A Plasma Rifle.\nFully recharges the rifle.
You are suffering from the effects of prolonged cryosleep.
You're not sure where you are or even who you are.
Colonized areas of space. Affects what factions you will find there.
Alien drones of unknown origin. Hostile.

[c][FFFFFF][b]Wanted by:[-][/c][/b] [c][4CA5FF]Free Colonists[-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF][b][b]Member of:[/b][-][/c] [c][BF0000]Bandits[-][/c]
Bring to a Bounty Hunter Office in trading station sectors in Colonists territory for a reward.

[c][D5D5D5]Savanth has been a thorn in the side of the Free Colonists for a number of years. Responsible for a number of bandit attacks on shipping lanes, he has now stepped up his attacks to include stations and civilian outposts.
The Free Colonists will pay for proof of his demise, although it is often not long until he returns in a freshly cloned body.[-][/c]

[c][FFFFFF][b]Wanted by:[-][/c][/b] [c][4CA5FF]Free Colonists[-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF][b][b]Member of:[/b][-][/c] [c][BF0000]Bandits[-][/c]
Bring to a Bounty Hunter Office in trading station sectors in Colonists territory for a reward.

[c][D5D5D5]Suspected of being a terrorist leader in the pirate gang known as the Bloodhunters, Marko made a name for himself for his extreme tactics.
He is wanted for his involvement in the asteroid bombardment of Intrazia Prime.[-][/c]

[c][FFFFFF][b]Wanted by:[-][/c][/b] [c][4CA5FF]Free Colonists[-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF][b][b]Member of:[/b][-][/c] [c][BF0000]Bandits[-][/c]
Bring to a Bounty Hunter Office in trading station sectors in Colonists territory for a reward.

[c][D5D5D5]Small Tony runs a local bandit gang and has frequently been spotted hiding out in derelict space stations.
Thought to have been killed more often than any other bandit, he keeps coming back for more thanks to his clone chamber which no one has been able to find.
The Free Colonists would pay well for anyone who can add one more death to his name.[-][/c]

[c][D5D5D5]Savanth has been a thorn in the side of the Free Pirates for a number of years. Responsible for a number of bandit attacks on shipping lanes, he has now stepped up his attacks to include stations and civilian outposts.
The Free Pirates will pay for proof of his demise, although it is often not long until he returns in a freshly cloned body.[-][/c]

[c][D5D5D5]Suspected of being a terrorist leader in the pirate gang known as the Bloodhunters, Marko made a name for himself for his extreme tactics.
He is wanted for his involvement in the asteroid bombardment of Intrazia Prime.[-][/c]

[c][D5D5D5]Small Tony runs a local bandit gang and has frequently been spotted hiding out in derelict space stations.
Thought to have been killed more often than any other bandit, he keeps coming back for more thanks to his clone chamber which no one has been able to find.
The Free Pirates would pay well for anyone who can add one more death to his name.[-][/c]

A data pad containing the communication frequency of a specific trading station or factory. Can be used to help locate the factory.

[c][00FFFF]Requirements:[-][/c]
[sup][c][FFFFFF]-Must be friendly with Trade Federation.
-Must be in personal toolbar to initially activate the mission then can be stored in cargo.
-If you have changed playfields or restarted the game move any item into or out of your inventory to update the PDA.
-Activate the tracking mission under PDA > Trading.
-Place the required scanning probe in your personal toolbar.
-As long as the mission is currently active you will get a notification on your HUD if you enter a playfield that contains the factory you are tracking.
-Does not pinpoint the exact location, only whether or not it exists in your current planet, moon, or sector to save time having to fully explore the area.
-The trading frequency is reusable and can be activated again in the PDA.[/sup][-][/c]
Alerts: <#ff0000>Low fuel. Requires at least 300 fuel per extractor.</color>
Alerts: <#ff0000>Low fuel. Requires at least fuel per extractor.</color> <#ffff00>Storage full.</color>
Welcome to our research vessel. What brings you all the way out here to {0}? As for us we are currently studying a nearby star cluster.

Welcome to my research vessel. We are currently performing research on the star in this system. If you have any questions I'd be happy to answer them, but please don't take up too much of my crew's time as they are behind schedule.
Hello. We are here in {0} performing scans of nearby planets in hopes of setting up a mining outpost.
Welcome aboard. I am the captain of this research vessel. You will have to excuse us as we are quite busy running scans on interstellar gases and anomalies.
-Then run it again! The diagnostic must have missed something!\nOh, hi, I didn't see you there. We were recently attacked by a Zirax Battlecarrier so we have a lot of repairs left to do.
We're currently scanning for resources in {0}. Is there something I can help you with?
Welcome to our research vessel. What brings you all the way out here to {0}? As for us we are currently studying a nearby star cluster.
I came to {0} looking for work. What about you?
I miss the forests of my homeworld. I'm trying to save up enough money to visit.
My access card is broken again.
I'd watch out for pickpockets if I were you.
Don't see many of your kind around here.
What brings you to the Badlands? Nevermind, I don't want to know. Nobody ever has a good reason to come out here.
I ran out of job prospects in Prosperity so I came here looking for work. Found only trouble.
Heed my advice and stay away from upstairs.
These games are rigged. I know because I'm the one who rigged them.
Bring out yer dead! Bring out yer dead!
I'm concerned with how fast the Syndicate has been expanding. Pretty soon there will be no more room for small time smugglers like myself. I mean, my totally legit cargo hauling business.
Keep to yourself and nobody will bother you.
You best keep walking, tough guy.
You want to buy some death sticks?
If you're looking for work I hear Underground Music is looking for a courier.
I don't know you and I don't want to know you.
I used to be an  adventurer like you then I took a look at my life and turned it around.
No one here is exactly what they appear.
Smuggler? Pirate? Slaver? Drug dealer? Which are you?
I heard the Syndicate is ran by someone they call The Raven.
I-I don't w-w-want any trouble pl-please!
Have you heard the good word of Farr?
Enjoying your visit to this freeport?
Stay away from gas clouds in space.
There's been a lot more smugglers coming through here lately. Something is going on.
Music? Entertainment? Food and drink? The Freeport here in {0} has it all!
I really, really hate it here in {0}.
If you're not paying me stay away from me.
No one comes here by accident. Why are you here, friend?
Take my advice and don't make the guards angry.
Colonist stations are popping up all over. Ripe for the raiding!
You want to have a go at me?
Did you hear what happened in the Sea of Silence?
A group from the Omicron Raiders came through here last week. Roudy bunch but tipped good. Guess they got a good haul.
You look like you could use a drink. Head on over to PAX Purgatory.
Keep a tight grip on your coin purse.
There's a secret way into the VIP lounge. No, I won't tell you where it is.
Have a question about Reforged Eden 2 or need support on the scenario? See the [c][00FFFF]Reforged Eden 2[-][/c] workshop!\nIf playing on a server contact your server admin.
Use the logistics system to transfer blocks and items too large to fit in your personal inventory.
Upgrade your warp drive or collect navigational data to increase the maximum range you can warp.
Combat sites are an excellent source of insignias that can be turned in at a faction's bounty office inside their galactic territory.
Help friendly miners in mining sites for lucrative rewards.
Hack into data vaults or salvage wrecks in exploration sites.
Explore asteroid fields to discover hidden resource asteroids.
Star class and faction territory can affect what you will find in a star system.
Some resources can only be found in certain territories or galactic regions.\nCheck the Empyriopedia in the PDA for more information.
Tooltips on blocks and items contain vital information on their use and the Empyiopedia in the PDA contains useful information on the scenario and is filled in as you progress.
Not all missions are tracked in your PDA.\nSometimes following clues to lead you to hidden treasure.
You continue to earn unlock points after level 25 through missions and turning in valuable items.
Schematics can unlock powerful crafting recipes or be sold for credits.
UCH Research Vessels provide useful services such as managing warp drive upgrades and unlocking schematics.\nThey can typically only be found in neutral territory.
The major regions of the galaxy are The Throne, The Forge, Tranquility, Prosperity, The Wastelands, Solitude, Sea of Silence, The Badlands, Nexus, The Dronelands, and Decay.
Scanning stations and science stations are useful equipment for exploration vessels.
Helping those in need can improve your reputation with a faction.
Passive power options such as solar panels, wind turbines, geothermal generators, or plasma turbines can improve or even eliminate fuel use.
Improve your shields by adding shield upgrades.\nBe careful, some weapons have shield penetration.
You can increase your maximum CPU by adding more CPU extenders.
There is a maximum number of light, medium, or heavy weapons you can have on a single ship or base.
You can upgrade a smaller thruster to a higher tier rather than replacing it with a larger thruster.
Using a dedicated mining vessel is much faster than mining by hand.
Add that finishing touch with decorative blocks such as effect projectors or lcd screens.
You can pay freighters to complete some jobs for you at a GIN console.
Sometimes you can find hackable satellites near a star.\nThese can be hacked into without a reputation penalty and can yield valuable reports and other rewards.
Before charging headfirst into an unfamiliar foe, take time to look them over from a safe distance.\nDon't try to engage dreadnoughts in a starting ship! Or do, it's a free galaxy.
Check a planet's gravity before trying to land otherwise your landing might be permanent.
The damage protection of your armor is reduced based on how much durability it's missing.\nKeep your armor repaired!
Some resources such as rich asteroids require specialized mining equipment.
[c][FFFF00]Kinetic weapons[-][/c] such as cannons and railguns do better versus exposed blocks.\n[c][00ffff]Energy weapons[-][/c] such as lasers do better versus shields.
Guns can be improved by attaching mods using a weapon locker.
Advanced warp drives have better pentaxid efficiency than standard warp drives.
You can improve your reputation with a faction you're hostile with by turning in insignias at a bounty office or helping them in combat, mining, or exploration sites.
G, F, and A class stars  are easy difficulty habitable systems.\nM and D class stars are medium difficulty cold systems.\nK, B, and O class stars are hard difficulty hot systems.
Beware of alien asteroid fields in exotic systems such as black holes or neutron stars.
Dangerous enemies can be found at the edge of the galaxy.
Completing the Project Eden prologue mission introduces you to the UCH Research Vessels and unlocks new missions and progression.
Advanced devices requiring rare materials cannot be replaced by repair services or repair bays.\nYou must manually replace them if destroyed.
You can use the search function on the galaxy map to search by planet or star name or by star class.
Hydroponics bays allow you to harvest the equivalent of 9 crops with a single button press.
Solar panels generate passive power based on distance from the main star and planetary atmospheric and weather conditions.
Plasma turbines passively reduce your power consumption at all times.
Wind turbines passively reduce your power consumption but can only be used on planets with mild climates.
Geothermal generators passively reduce your power consumption but can only be used on geologically active planets such as lava planets.
Stealing from your allies or attacking them will lower your reputation.
Don't forget to set a home spawn just in case.
Many Planets & Moons have untold treasures.  Explore them all. You never know what you'll find!
Sometimes it's nice to have a place to call home.
Strange anomalies lurk in the dark.
Prey animals are passive and will often run away.\nPredators will attack you on sight.
Hover vessels can protect you from environmental hazards and hostile wildlife.
Switch out your armor and armor boosters to fit the situation you find yourself in.
Exotic star systems can contain mystery and danger.
There are dozens of planet and moon types out there to explore.
Trading stations are found in the territory of most major factions.
There are places in the galaxy where one must tread carefully.
Some factions are at war with each other and will engage in combat.
Each region has its own color of nebula.
Every star you see is a star you can visit.
Specialized crew offer unique bonuses and further increase your maximum CPU.
Alarm sentries can warn you of approaching danger.
Don't forget to save a repair template of your ship before going into battle.
